因此，用拉康的著名口号来说，无意识的结构就像一种语言。但是语言是如何构造的呢？他继续说，现代语言研究始于索绪尔，索绪尔表明语言的意义是词语与其他词语之间的对比，而不是词语与事物之间的对比。也就是说，意义是一个差异网络。能指（词）和所指（所指）之间存在永久的障碍。他用一张图表展示了这种内在的分隔，图表显示了两个相同的厕所门，一个是“女士”，另一个是“先生”。这表明同一个能指可能有不同的所指，因此（Lodge，第 86 页）“只有能指和能指之间的相关性才能为所有意义研究提供标准”。因此，“我们被迫接受所指在能指下不断滑动的概念（Lodge，第 87 页）。也就是说，词语和意义有自己的生命，并不断地超越和模糊外部现实的假定简单性和清晰性。如果能指仅相互关联，那么语言就会脱离外部现实，成为一个独立的领域，这是后结构主义思想中的一个重要概念（见第 3 章，第 61-2 页）。

So the unconscious, in Lacan’s famous slogan, is structured like a language. But how is a language structured? Modern language studies, he goes on, begin with Saussure, who shows that meaning in language is a matter of contrasts between words and other words, not between words and things. Meaning, that is to say, is a network of differences. There is a perpetual barrier between signifier (the word) and signified (the referent). He demonstrates this built-in separation with a diagram showing two identical lavatory doors, one headed ‘Ladies’ the other ‘Gentlemen’. This purports to show that the same signifier may have different signifieds, so that (Lodge, p. 86) ‘only the correlations between signifier and signifier supply the standard for all research into meaning’. Hence, ‘we are forced to accept the notion of an incessant sliding of the signified under the signifer’ (Lodge, p. 87). That is, words and meanings have a life of their own and constantly override and obscure the supposed simplicities and clarity of external reality. If signifiers relate only to one another, then language is detached from external reality, and becomes an independent realm, a crucial notion in post-structuralist thinking (see Chapter 3, pp. 61–2).

但是有什么证据表明无意识在结构上如拉康所说的那样是“语言的”呢？他认为，弗洛伊德确定的两种“梦境工作”机制，浓缩和置换（本章，第 94-5 页）对应于语言学家罗曼雅各布森确定的语言的基本两极，即隐喻和转喻，分别. 对应的是：

But what evidence is there that the unconscious is ‘linguistic’ in structure as Lacan alleges? He argues that the two ‘dream work’ mechanisms identified by Freud, condensation and displacement (this chapter, pp. 94–5) correspond to the basic poles of language identified by the linguist Roman Jakobson, that is, to metaphor and metonymy, respectively. The correspondence is that:

1. 在转喻中，通过部分代表整体，一物代表另一物。所以二十帆就意味着二十艘船。在弗洛伊德的梦解释中，梦中的一个元素可能通过位移代表其他东西：因此，一个人可能由他们的一个属性代表；例如，一个意大利人的情人在梦中可能会被比方说，一辆阿尔法罗密欧汽车所代表。拉康说这与转喻相同，部分代表整体。

1. In metonymy one thing represents another by means of the part standing for the whole. So twenty sail would mean twenty ships. In Freudian dream interpretation an element in a dream might stand for something else by displacement: so, a person might be represented by one of their attributes; for instance, a lover who is Italian might be represented in a dream by, let’s say, an Alfa Romeo car. Lacan says this is the same as metonymy, the part standing for the whole.

2. 在凝结中，几件事可能被压缩成一个符号，就像“船犁过海浪”这样的比喻将两个不同的图像凝结成一个项目，船穿过大海，犁穿过土壤。

2. In condensation several things might be compressed into one symbol, just as a metaphor like ‘the ship ploughed the waves’ condenses into a single item two different images, the ship cutting through the sea and the plough cutting through the soil.

无意识对这些自我表达的语言手段的使用是拉康声称无意识的结构像语言的证据的一部分。他继续强调弗洛伊德作品的语言方面：每当讨论无意识时，语言分析的数量就会增加，因为双关语、典故和其他类型的文字游戏通常是使无意识内容显化的机制——想想例如，回到“aliquis”的例子。
The use by the unconscious of these linguistic means of self-expression is part of Lacan’s evidence for the claim that the unconscious is structured like a language. He goes on to emphasise the linguistic aspect of Freud’s work: whenever the unconscious is being discussed the amount of linguistic analysis increases, since puns, allusions, and other kinds of word play are often the mechanisms which make manifest the content of the unconscious – think back to the ‘aliquis’ example, for instance.

文章的过渡部分再次将注意力从一直被视为原初自我的意识自我转移到作为“我们存在的核心”的无意识自我。在西方哲学中，有意识的头脑长期以来一直被认为是个性。这种观点体现在哲学家笛卡尔的宣言中，“我思故我在”。拉康对这种哲学共识提出了戏剧性的挑战（请记住，他是在向哲学系学生的听众讲话），当他将其反转为“我在我认为不存在的地方”（Lodge，第 97 页）时，也就是说，在无意识中，我真正的自我所在。那么，拉康坚持认为，弗洛伊德对无意识的发现应遵循其逻辑结论，即“自我对自身的激进异常中心性”（Lodge，第 101 页）。他问：“这个我更依恋而不是我自己的那个人是谁，因为在我同意我自己的身份的核心中，仍然是他在摇我？” （洛奇，第 102 页). 因此，自我被“解构”，显示为仅仅是一种语言效果，而不是一个本质实体。那么，无意识是“我们存在的内核”，但无意识就像一种语言，而语言在个体进入之前就作为一种结构存在。因此，自由人文主义关于独特的个体自我的概念被解构了。因此，该论点的影响极其雄心勃勃且范围广泛。在几页中，拉康试图改变我们对自己是什么的最深刻的观念。

The transition section of the essay moves attention again from the conscious self, which has always been regarded as the primary self, to the unconscious as ‘the kernel of our being’. In Western philosophy the conscious mind has long been regarded as the essence of selfhood. This view is encapsulated in the proclamation by the philosopher Descartes, ‘I think, therefore I am’. Lacan lays down a dramatic challenge to this philosophical consensus (remember that he is addressing an audience of philosophy students) when he reverses this into ‘I am where I think not’ (Lodge, p. 97), that is, in the unconscious, where my true selfhood lies. Lacan insists, then, that the Freudian discovery of the unconscious be followed through to its logical conclusion, which is ‘the self’s radical ex-centricity to itself’ (Lodge, p. 101). And he asks ‘who is this other to whom I am more attached than to myself, since at the heart of my assent to my own identity it is still he who wags me?’ (Lodge, p. 102). Hence, the self is ‘deconstructed’, shown to be merely a linguistic effect, not an essential entity. The unconscious, then, is the ‘kernel of our being’, but the unconscious is like a language, and language exists as a structure before the individual enters into it. Hence, the liberal humanist notion of unique, individual selfhood is deconstructed. The argument, then, is extremely ambitious and wide-ranging in its effects. In a few pages Lacan seeks to alter nothing less than our deepest notions of what we are.

但是，为什么文学评论家对它特别感兴趣呢？我认为这个问题的答案是文章中提出的观点的无情逻辑的结果。因此，拉康说无意识是“我们存在的内核”，但由于无意识是语言的，而语言是一个在我们进入它之前就已经完整并存在的系统，那么由此得出的是，一个独特的、独立的概念自我被解构。如果真是这样，那么反过来又依赖于独特的独立自我概念的“性格”观念就站不住脚了。因此，接受拉康立场的一个主要后果就是拒绝文学中传统的人物刻画观点。由于拉康将主体的概念解构为意识的稳定混合物，我们几乎不能把小说人物当作人来接受，而是必须暂时搁置他们，将他们视为聚集在专有名称周围的能指集合。因此，需要一种完全不同的阅读策略。

But why, in particular, is it of such interest to literary critics? I think the answer to this question is a consequence of the relentless logic of the views put forward in the essay. Thus, Lacan says that the unconscious is the ‘kernel of our being’, but since the unconscious is linguistic, and language is a system already complete and in existence before we enter into it, then it follows that the notion of a unique, separate self is deconstructed. If this is so, the idea of ‘character’, which rests in turn on the notion of a unique separate self, becomes untenable. So a major consequence of accepting the Lacanian position would be to reject the conventional view of characterisation in literature. Since Lacan deconstructs the idea of the subject as a stable amalgam of consciousness, we can hardly accept novelistic characters as people but must hold them in abeyance, as it were, and see them as assemblages of signifiers clustering round a proper name. Hence, a wholly different reading strategy is demanded.

此外，拉康提供的语言观点认为它从根本上脱离了世界上的任何指称。接受这种观点会导致拒绝文学现实主义，因为在现实主义小说中，潜在的假设是文本描绘了现实世界为了我们。因此，采用拉康的观点将涉及评价现代主义或后现代主义实验性的、支离破碎的、暗示性的文本，例如，一部小说玩弄小说的手法，暗示其他小说，等等，就像索绪尔一样, 构成一种语言的能指仅相互指代，并相互作用，但不构想出一个世界。因此，还需要一套完全不同的文学偏好。

Further, the view of language offered by Lacan sees it as fundamentally detached from any referent in the world. Accepting this view leads to a rejection of literary realism, since in realist novels the underlying assumption is that the text figures forth the real world for us. Hence, adopting the Lacanian outlook would involve valuing instead the modernist or postmodernist experimental, fragmented, allusive text, where, for instance, a novel plays with the devices of the novel, alludes to other novels, and so on, just as, for Saussure, the signifiers which make up a language refer only to one another, and interact with one another, but do not figure forth a world. Hence, a wholly different set of literary preferences is also demanded.

拉康对无意识的强调使他推测我们进入意识的机制。在自我意识出现之前，幼儿存在于一个拉康称之为想象界的领域，在这个领域中，自我与他者之间没有区别，并且存在一种与母亲的理想化认同。然后，在 6 个月到 18 个月之间，他称之为“镜子阶段”，此时孩子在镜子中看到自己的倒影，并开始将自己视为一个统一的存在，与世界其他部分分离。在这个阶段，孩子进入了语言系统，本质上是一个与缺乏和分离有关的系统——拉康的关键概念——因为语言命名不存在的东西并用语言符号代替它。这个阶段也标志着社会化的开始，与其禁忌和约束，与父亲的形象相关联。孩子现在进入的新秩序被象征主义的拉康称为。想象界和象征界之间的这种区别已被广泛用于文学研究，例如，法国女权主义评论家（见第 6 章，p. 124). 就现实主义和反现实主义文本之间的文学两极分化而言，象征领域必须被视为现实主义文学中的象征领域，一个父权秩序和逻辑的世界。相比之下，反现实主义的文本代表了想象的领域，在这个世界中，语言超越了自身，超越了逻辑和语法，就像诗歌语言经常做的那样。事实上，想象界和象征界之间的对比可以被视为类似于诗歌和散文之间的对比。在实践中，这两个领域和两种语言必须始终共存，接受拉康观点而产生的批判立场将涉及对那种文学文本的偏好，在这种文学文本中，想象进入象征，质疑自己的现实主义。这类作品的一个很好的例子是英国小说家 BS 约翰逊的作品，他不断的文本创造力采取的形式是，例如，人物交叉质疑作者的时刻，对他的动机版本提出异议，或者他对他们所描绘的情节的处理。因此，表面上抽象的拉康概念，例如主体（自我）的建构性和不稳定性，或作为语言建构的主体，或作为独立话语域的语言，都可以在作品的结构中看到。的小说。

Lacan’s foregrounding of the unconscious leads him to speculate about the mechanism whereby we emerge into consciousness. Before the sense of self emerges the young child exists in a realm which Lacan calls the Imaginary, in which there is no distinction between self and Other and there is a kind of idealised identification with the mother. Then, between six months and eighteen months comes what he calls the ‘mirror-stage’, when the child sees its own reflection in the mirror and begins to conceive of itself as a unified being, separate from the rest of the world. At this stage the child enters into the language system, essentially a system which is concerned with lack and separation – crucial Lacanian concepts – since language names what is not present and substitutes a linguistic sign for it. This stage also marks the beginning of socialisation, with its prohibitions and restraints, associated with the figure of the father. The new order which the child now enters is called by Lacan the Symbolic. This distinction between the Imaginary and the Symbolic has been used extensively in literary studies, for instance, by French feminist critics (see Chapter 6, p. 124). In terms of the literary polarisation between the realist and the anti-realist text, the Symbolic realm would have to be seen as the one found in realist literature, a world of patriarchal order and logic. By contrast, the anti-realist text represents the realm of the Imaginary, a world in which language gestures beyond itself, beyond logic and grammar, rather in the way that poetic language often does. Indeed, the contrast between the Imaginary and the Symbolic might be seen as analogous to that between poetry and prose. In practice the two realms, and the two kinds of language, must always co-exist, and the critical stance which follows from an acceptance of the Lacanian outlook will involve a preference for the kind of literary text in which there are constant irruptions of the Imaginary into the Symbolic, as in the kind of ‘metafiction’ or ‘magic realism’ in which the novel undercuts and queries its own realism. A fine example of this kind of work would be that of the British novelist B. S. Johnson, whose constant textual inventiveness takes the form, for instance, of moments when the characters cross-question the author, taking issue with his version of their motives, or his handling of the plots in which they figure. Hence, apparently abstract Lacanian notions, such as the constructedness and instability of the subject (the self), or the subject as a linguistic construct, or language as a self-contained universe of discourse can be seen in action in the texture of the work of fiction.

拉康主义批评家做什么

What Lacanian critics do

1. 像弗洛伊德的批评家一样，他们密切关注无意识的动机和感受，但他们不是挖掘作者或人物的动机和感受，而是寻找文本本身的动机和感受，揭示意义的矛盾暗流，就像潜意识一样潜伏在“意识到'文本。这是定义“解构”过程的另一种方式。

1. Like Freudian critics they pay close attention to unconscious motives and feelings, but instead of excavating for those of the author or characters, they search out those of the text itself, uncovering contradictory undercurrents of meaning, which lie like a subconscious beneath the ‘conscious’ of the text. This is another way of defining the process of ‘deconstruction’.

2. 它们展示了拉康精神分析症状或阶段在文学作品中的存在，例如镜像阶段或无意识的主权。

2. They demonstrate the presence in the literary work of Lacanian psychoanalytic symptoms or phases, such as the mirror-stage or the sovereignty of the unconscious.

3. 他们根据一系列更广泛的拉康取向来对待文学文本，例如缺乏或欲望等概念。

3. They treat the literary text in terms of a series of broader Lacanian orientations, towards such concepts as lack or desire, for instance.

4. 他们将文学文本视为拉康关于语言和无意识观点的制定或展示，特别是所指的普遍难以捉摸和无意识的中心地位。在实践中，这导致支持挑战文学表现惯例的反现实主义文本。

4. They see the literary text as an enactment or demonstration of Lacanian views about language and the unconscious, particularly the endemic elusiveness of the signified, and the centrality of the unconscious. In practice, this results in favouring the anti-realist text which challenges the conventions of literary representation.

拉康式批评：一个例子

Lacanian criticism: an example

为了说明拉康对文学的一些关注，我们现在可以简要地看一下拉康对埃德加·爱伦·坡的开创性侦探小说《失窃的信》的著名解释。（这个故事包含在企鹅出版社Edgar Allan Poe：Selected Writings， ed. David Galloway，并在The Purloined Poe 中转载。）拉康在一系列“研讨会”中分析了这个故事，作为实习分析师入门过程的一部分。在 1980 年代，为响应这些研讨会的出版而撰写了几篇后结构主义论文，并且大部分材料已被有用地收集并重新发表在The Purloined Poe 中。此外，Newton's Theory into Practice包含拉康精神分析评论家 Shoshana Felman 就该主题发表的一篇文章。由于是拉康本人的作品，这个例子展示了上面列出的拉康批判活动的第四个，拉康在其中找到了他自己对语言和精神分析过程的看法的证据。

To illustrate some of the concerns of a Lacanian approach to literature we can now look briefly at Lacan’s well-known interpretation of Edgar Allan Poe’s pioneering detective story ‘The Purloined Letter’. (The tale is included in the Penguin Edgar Allan Poe: Selected Writings, ed. David Galloway, and also reprinted in The Purloined Poe.) Lacan analysed this story in a series of ‘seminars’, as part of the induction process for trainee analysts. In the 1980s several post-structuralist essays were written in response to the publication of these seminars, and much of the material has usefully been collected and republished in The Purloined Poe. Also, Newton’s Theory into Practice contains an essay on the topic by the Lacanian psychoanalytic critic Shoshana Felman. Since it is by Lacan himself, this example demonstrates the fourth of the Lacanian critical activities listed above, Lacan finding in it evidence of his own views on language, and on the process of psychoanalysis.

爱伦·坡的故事带有一种典型的气质，很适合精神分析的解释。没有深入的人物刻画，这些人物让人联想到作者在虚张声势、反虚张声势和诡计的仪式性战斗中移动的棋子。他们被命名为女王、国王、大臣、警察局长和侦探杜平。发生的事情可以分为四个阶段：

Poe’s story has about it an archetypal air which lends itself well to psychoanalytic interpretation. There is no in-depth characterisation, the characters being suggestive of chess pieces which are moved about by the author in a ritualistic combat of bluff, counter-bluff, and subterfuge. They are named the Queen, the King, the Minister, the Chief of Police and Dupin, the detective. What happens can be divided into four phases:

1. 当国王突然进入时，大臣正在她的公寓里与女王讨论。他注意到她担心国王不应该看到桌上的一封信，但她不能隐瞒，因为这会引起他的注意。当两人的注意力都被分散时，部长将其取下，并从他自己的口袋中取出一封外观相似的信件。

1. The Minister is in discussion with the Queen in her apartments when the King enters unexpectedly. He notices that she is anxious the King should not see a letter which is on the desk, but she can’t conceal it as this would draw his attention to it. When the attention of both is distracted the Minister removes it, substituting a letter from his own pocket which has a similar appearance.

2. 当她发现盗窃案时，女王意识到谁是罪魁祸首，当部长不在时，她让警察局长和他的手下搜查他的公寓。尽管采用了最彻底、最科学的方法，他们还是一无所获。

2. When she discovers the theft the Queen realises who is responsible, and when the Minister is away she gets the Chief of Police and his men to search his apartments. In spite of employing the most thorough and scientific methods they find nothing.

3. 无奈之下，她向杜宾求助。他拜访大臣，理由是将信件随身携带风险太大，但它的用处在于随时可以出示，总不能藏在屋外。但如果它藏在屋子里，搜索就会发现它，所以它一定在屋子里，但没有藏起来。果然，他看到壁炉架上方的那封信，不小心被塞进了其他信件中。

3. In desperation she asks for Dupin’s help. He visits the Minister and reasons that carrying the letter on his person would be too great a risk, but its usefulness lies in his being able to produce it at any time, so it can’t be hidden outside the house. But if it had been hidden inside the house the search would have discovered it, so it must be in the house but not hidden. Sure enough, he sees the letter above the mantelpiece, carelessly pushed in amongst other items of correspondence.

4. 他再次拜访，在街上安排了一个消遣，用一封假信代替了它。这封信被退回给女王和大臣不知道他不再拥有它，导致了自己的垮台。假货内的一张纸条显示，这是杜宾对早年在恋爱中被部长欺骗的报复。

4. He visits again, and having arranged a distraction in the street, substitutes a fake letter for it. The letter is returned to the Queen, and the Minister, unaware that he no longer possesses it, brings about his own downfall. A note inside the fake reveals that this is Dupin’s revenge for being duped by the Minister in a love affair in earlier life.

拉康对这个故事的描述很长，但与弗洛伊德对爱伦·坡的传统批评有着明显的不同，后者在弗洛伊德 1930 年代的弟子玛丽·波拿巴 (Marie Bonaparte) 的作品中得到了最好的体现（也摘自《被盗的爱伦·坡》）。在波拿巴那里，这个故事就像爱伦·坡的所有作品一样被解读为作者神经质的内心生活的症状。因此，她阅读了作者的文本以外的内容，根据故事的内容在他身上识别出对母亲的迷恋和恋尸癖。相比之下，拉康并没有谈论个别作者的心理，而是将文本视为一种隐喻，它揭示了无意识的各个方面、精神分析的本质以及语言的各个方面。我们可以将这些总结如下：
Lacan’s account of the tale is lengthy, but of markedly different character from the conventional Freudian criticism of Poe, which is best represented by the work of Freud’s 1930s disciple Marie Bonaparte (also extracted in The Purloined Poe). In Bonaparte the tale is read, as are all Poe’s works, as a symptom of the author’s neurotic inner life. Thus, she reads beyond the text to the author, identifying in him a mother fixation and necrophilia on the basis of the content of the tales. Lacan, by contrast, does not talk about the psychology of the individual author, but sees the text as a metaphor which throws light upon aspects of the unconscious, on the nature of psychoanalysis, and on aspects of language. We can summarise these as follows:

1.被盗的信件是无意识本身的象征。在故事中，我们对内容一无所知信件的：我们只是看到它影响了故事中每个人的行为。同样，根据定义，无意识的内容是不可知的，但我们所做的一切都会受到它的影响：我们可以通过观察其影响来猜测该内容的性质，就像我们可以从中推断出信件内容的一般性质一样它产生的焦虑。弗洛伊德的调查导致了对无意识内容的确切性质的自信断言，但拉康对这种确定性的可能性持怀疑态度。就像这封信一样，可能理解我们内心世界的部分已经被窃取，我们必须学会在没有它们的情况下运作。也就是说，我们必须在没有密钥的情况下使用代码。

1. The stolen letter is an emblem of the unconscious itself. In the story we find out nothing about the content of the letter: we merely see it affecting the actions of every person in the tale. Likewise, the content of the unconscious is, by definition, unknowable, but everything we do is affected by it: we can guess at the nature of this content by observing its effects, just as we can deduce the general nature of the letter’s contents from the anxiety it generates. Freud’s investigations resulted in confident assertions about the precise nature of the content of the unconscious, but Lacan is much more sceptical about the possibility of such certainties. Like the letter, the pieces which might make sense of our inner mental universe have been purloined, and we have to learn to operate without them. We have, that is, to use the code without having the key.

2.杜宾对被盗信件犯罪的调查制定了精神分析的过程。精神分析中的分析师使用重复和替代：在让患者用语言表达痛苦的压抑记忆时，原始事件以语言形式重复，但随后在意识中用语言描述代替潜意识中压抑的记忆。一旦它是有意识的和语言化的，记忆就会被剥夺和心理健康得到恢复。同样，杜宾在故事中的调查过程以重复和替换为中心：他盗窃大臣的信件是大臣从女王那里盗窃信件的重复，而这两种情况下的盗窃都是通过替换实现的，一封假信是用作真品的替代品。

2. Dupin’s investigation of the crime of the stolen letter enacts the process of psychoanalysis. The analyst in psychoanalysis uses repetition and substitution: in getting the patient to verbalise painful repressed memories, the original event is repeated in verbal form, but the verbal account is then substituted in the conscious mind for the repressed memory in the unconscious. Once it is conscious and verbalised, the memory is disempowered and mental well-being is restored. Likewise, Dupin’s investigative process in the story centres on repetition and substitution: his theft of the letter from the Minister is a repetition of the Minister’s theft of it from the Queen, and the theft in both cases is achieved by substitution, a false letter being used as a replacement for the real one.

3.内容不明的字母是语言本质方面的体现。语言中有无尽的能指游戏，但与语言之外的任何所指内容没有简单的联系。所指总是丢失或被窃取。同样，我们在整个故事中都看到了这封信的意义，但我们永远无法确切地了解其中的含义。它是意义本身的一个例子，而不是某个特定事物的标志。同样，所有的单词都是被窃取的字母：我们永远无法打开它们并明确地查看它们的内容；我们有能指，可以说是概念的语言信封，但这些信封无法打开，因此所指将始终隐藏，就像爱伦·坡故事中被盗信的内容一样。

3. The letter with the unknown content is an embodiment of aspects of the nature of language. In language there is an endless play of signifiers, but no simple connection with any signified content beyond language. The signified is always lost or purloined. In the same way, we see the significance of the letter throughout the story, but we never find out precisely what is signified within it. It is an example of signification itself, not a sign of some specific thing. Likewise, all words are purloined letters: we can never open them and view their content unambiguously; we have the signifiers, which are the verbal envelopes of concepts, so to speak, but these envelopes cannot be unsealed, so that the signifieds will always remain hidden, just like the content of the purloined letter in Poe’s tale.

比较本章讨论的弗洛伊德和拉康的例子，我们会立即发现这两种方法之间存在着巨大的鸿沟，尽管——自相矛盾的是——它们都源于弗洛伊德理论的同一个原始主体。
Comparing the Freudian and Lacanian examples discussed in this chapter will make it immediately apparent that there is an immense gulf between these two approaches, even though – paradoxically – they both stem from the same original body of Freudian theory.

选读

Selected reading

一般的

General

Ellmann, Maud, 编辑。精神分析文学批评（Longman，1994）。

一个有用的集合，展示了弗洛伊德和拉康对批评的影响。

Ellmann, Maud, ed. Psychoanalytic Literary Criticism (Longman, 1994).

A useful collection, showing the influence of Freud and Lacan on criticism.

Felman, Shoshana, 编辑。文学与精神分析——阅读的问题：否则（约翰霍普金斯大学出版社，1982 年）。

重要的论文集。费尔曼自己的“转动解释的螺丝钉”是关于亨利詹姆斯的故事“螺丝钉的转动”，这是最早受到精神分析批评的文本之一（由评论家埃德蒙威尔逊于 1934 年提出）。

Felman, Shoshana, ed. Literature and Psychoanalysis – The Question of Reading: Otherwise (Johns Hopkins University Press, 1982).

An important collection of essays. Felman’s own ‘Turning the screw of interpretation’ is about Henry James’s story ‘The Turn of the Screw’, one of the earliest texts to be subjected to psychoanalytic criticism (by the critic Edmund Wilson in 1934).

Jefferson, Ann 和 Robey, David, eds, Modern Literary Theory: A Comparative Introduction (Batsford, 2nd edn, 1986). 第五章“现代精神分析批评”。

一个有用的一般帐户，不限于弗洛伊德。

Jefferson, Ann and Robey, David, eds, Modern Literary Theory: A Comparative Introduction (Batsford, 2nd edn, 1986). Chapter five ‘Modern psychoanalytic criticism’.

A useful general account, not restricted to Freud.

库兹韦尔，伊迪丝，编辑。文学与精神分析（哥伦比亚大学出版社，1983 年）。

一个非常有用的收藏，带有很好的编辑评论。第一部分是关于早期精神分析理论的，第三部分是关于文学应用的，包括关于济慈、亨利·詹姆斯令人不安的鬼故事“欢乐角”、卡夫卡和刘易斯·卡罗尔的文章。最后一节是法国精神分析理论。

Kurzweil, Edith, ed. Literature and Psychoanalysis (Columbia University Press, 1983).

A very useful collection with good editorial commentary. The first section is on early psychoanalytic theory, the third on literary applications, including essays on Keats, on Henry James’s disturbing ghost story ‘The Jolly Corner’, on Kafka, and on Lewis Carroll. The final section is on French psychoanalytic theory.

Wise、Inge 和 Mills、Maggie 和 eds，《精神分析思想与莎士比亚》（卡纳克书店，2006 年）。

一本“将吟游诗人的世界与精神分析思想和实践联系起来”的书。

Wise, Inge and Mills, Maggie, and eds, Psychoanalytic Ideas and Shakespeare (Karnac Books, 2006).

A book which ‘links the bard’s universe to psychoanalytic thought and practice’.

Wright, Elizabeth，《精神分析批评：实践中的理论》（Polity Press，修订版，1998 年）。

简短而广泛，涉及弗洛伊德和拉康的方法，以及此处未讨论的其他方法，但读起来并不容易。

Wright, Elizabeth, Psychoanalytic Criticism: Theory in Practice (Polity Press, revised edn, 1998).

Short and wide-ranging, dealing with Freudian and Lacanian approaches, as well as others not discussed here, but not an easy read.

弗洛伊德

Freud

Bernheimer、Charles 和 Kahane、Claire，在多拉的案例中：弗洛伊德、歇斯底里和女权主义（哥伦比亚大学出版社，第 2 版，1990 年）。

各种评论员对弗洛伊德处理此案的批评，包括雅克·拉康（Jacques Lacan）（简短而尖锐）、Jacqueline Rose、Toril Moi 和 Jane Gallop。这本书通过转向拉康主义和后结构主义对弗洛伊德的重新解读，超越了女权主义和精神分析之间传统的（但现在已经过时的）对立。

Bernheimer, Charles and Kahane, Claire, In Dora’s Case: Freud, Hysteria, and Feminism (Columbia University Press, 2nd edn, 1990).

A critique of Freud’s handling of this case, by various commentators, including Jacques Lacan (briefly and incisively), Jacqueline Rose, Toril Moi, and Jane Gallop. This book works beyond the traditional (but now outmoded) antagonism between feminism and psychoanalysis by moving towards Lacanian and post-structuralist re-readings of Freud.

Freud, Sigmund, The Interpretation of Dreams（1900 年首次出版。Penguin Freud 第四卷）。

创造二十世纪感性的重要作品。解释基本的梦想机制，“凝聚”，VIa；“位移”，VIb；还有俄狄浦斯情结和哈姆雷特363-8。

Freud, Sigmund, The Interpretation of Dreams (first published in 1900. Volume four in the Penguin Freud).

A key work in the creation of twentieth-century sensibility. Explains the basic dream mechanisms, ‘Condensation’, VIa; ‘Displacement’, VIb; also the Oedipus complex and Hamlet 363–8.

Freud, Sigmund, The Psychopathology of Everyday Life（1901 年首次出版。Penguin Freud 第五卷）。

非常可读和有趣，尽管标题。无论是这本书还是案例历史都是从弗洛伊德开始的最佳起点。

Freud, Sigmund, The Psychopathology of Everyday Life (first published in 1901. Volume five in the Penguin Freud).

Very readable and interesting, in spite of the title. Either this book or the case histories would be the best place to begin with Freud.

Freud, Sigmund, Case History I: 'Dora' and 'Little Hans'（企鹅弗洛伊德第八卷）。

弗洛伊德解释的详细记录。上面强调的独创性和复杂性在这些叙述中非常明显。

Freud, Sigmund, Case Histories I: ‘Dora’ and ‘Little Hans’ (Volume eight in the Penguin Freud).

Detailed records of Freudian interpretation. The element of ingenuity and complexity emphasised above is very evident in these accounts.

Thurschwell、Pamela、Sigmund Freud (Routledge, 2000)。

“批判性思想家”系列中的一个有用的标题，在介绍范围上与旧的“丰塔纳现代大师”系列相似。

Thurschwell, Pamela, Sigmund Freud (Routledge, 2000).

A useful title in the ‘Critical Thinkers’ series, which is similar in introductory scope to the old ‘Fontana Modern Masters’ series.

Timpanaro, Sebastiano, The Freudian Slip: Psychoanalysis and Textual Criticism (Verso Paperback, 1985).

我列出这本由一位著名的意大利马克思主义者撰写的引人入胜且可读的书，部分原因是它说明了马克思主义与精神分析之间的传统对立。廷帕纳罗“解构”了弗洛伊德精神病理学中的许多错误，理由是它们可以用偶然的语言相似性来解释。例如，参见他对“aliquis”示例的讨论，第 19-28 页。

Timpanaro, Sebastiano, The Freudian Slip: Psychoanalysis and Textual Criticism (Verso Paperback, 1985).

I list this fascinating and readable book by a noted Italian Marxist partly because it is illustrative of the traditional antagonism between Marxism and psychoanalysis. Timpanaro ‘deconstructs’ many of the slips in Freud’s Psychopathology on the grounds that they are explicable in terms of incidental verbal similarities. See, for instance, his discussion of the ‘aliquis’ example, pp. 19–28.

Wolheim, Richard, Freud（丰塔纳出版社，第 2 版，1991 年）。

还是最好的介绍。但先阅读弗洛伊德本人的一些著作。

Wolheim, Richard, Freud (Fontana Press, 2nd edn, 1991).

Still the best introduction. But read some of Freud himself first.

拉康

Lacan

荷马、肖恩、雅克·拉康(Routledge Critical Thinkers, 2005)。

有用系列中的有用标题。

Homer, Sean, Jacques Lacan (Routledge Critical Thinkers, 2005).

A useful title in a useful series.

拉康，雅克，“哈姆雷特中的欲望和欲望的解释”，转载于文学和精神分析——阅读的问题：否则，编辑。Shoshana Felman（约翰霍普金斯大学出版社，1982 年），第 11-52 页。

Lacan, Jacques, ‘Desire and the interpretation of desire in Hamlet’, reprinted in Literature and Psychoanalysis – The Question of Reading: Otherwise, ed. Shoshana Felman (Johns Hopkins University Press, 1982), pp. 11–52.

拉康，雅克，“无意识中对字母的坚持”，重印于《现代批评与理论》，编辑。David Lodge（朗文出版社，1988 年），第 79–106 页。

Lacan, Jacques, ‘The insistence of the letter in the unconscious’, reprinted in Modern Criticism and Theory, ed. David Lodge (Longman, 1988), pp. 79–106.

拉康，雅克，“失窃的信”研讨会，转载于失窃的爱伦·坡：拉康、德里达和精神分析阅读，编辑。John P. Muller 和 William J. Richardson（约翰霍普金斯大学出版社，1988 年），第 28-54 页，附有广泛的编辑评论和注释。

Lacan, Jacques, Seminar on ‘The Purloined Letter’, reprinted in The Purloined Poe: Lacan, Derrida, and Psychoanalytic Reading, ed. John P. Muller and William J. Richardson (Johns Hopkins University Press, 1988), pp. 28–54, with extensive editorial commentary and annotations.

拉康、雅克、埃克里茨(Routledge, 2001)。

劳特利奇 (Routledge) 出色的“经典”系列中非常受欢迎的出版物，该系列重印了 20 世纪的关键批评文本。

Lacan, Jacques, Ecrits (Routledge, 2001).

A very welcome publication in Routledge’s excellent ‘Classics’ series which reprints key critical texts of the twentieth century.

Mitchell, Juliet and Rose, Jacqueline, eds, Feminine Sexuality: Jacques Lacan and the Ecole Freudienne (Macmillan, 1982).

翻译和讨论了重要的拉康主义文本。

Mitchell, Juliet and Rose, Jacqueline, eds, Feminine Sexuality: Jacques Lacan and the Ecole Freudienne (Macmillan, 1982).

Key Lacanian texts translated and discussed.

Rabaté, Jean-Michel, ed. 拉康的剑桥同伴（剑桥文学同伴，2003 年）。

研究拉康思想的更高级材料。

Rabaté, Jean-Michel, ed. The Cambridge Companion to Lacan (Cambridge Companions to Literature, 2003).

More advanced material for the study of Lacan’s ideas.

Sarup、Madan、雅克·拉康(Harvester, 1992)。

现代文化理论家系列中的一卷，由一位能干的解释困难材料的人撰写。以对弗洛伊德思想的描述开始，以对拉康和女权主义的讨论结束。

Sarup, Madan, Jacques Lacan (Harvester, 1992).

A volume in the Modern Cultural Theorists series by an able explainer of difficult material. Begins with an account of Freudian ideas and ends with a discussion of Lacan and feminism.

6

女性主义批评

6

Feminist criticism

女权主义和女权主义批评

Feminism and feminist criticism

当然，1960 年代的“妇女运动”并不是女权主义的开端。相反，它是一种旧的思想和行动传统的复兴，其经典书籍已经诊断出社会中妇女的不平等问题，并（在某些情况下）提出了解决方案。这些书包括玛丽·沃斯通克拉夫特 (Mary Wollstonecraft) 的《为妇女权利辩护》( A Vindication of the Rights of Women，1792 年)，其中讨论了像弥尔顿、蒲柏和卢梭这样的男性作家；奥利弗·施莱纳 ( Olive Schreiner) 的《妇女与劳工》 (1911)；弗吉尼亚·伍尔夫 (Virginia Woolf) 的《一间自己的房间》( A Room of One's Own , 1929)，生动地描绘了寻求教育和替代婚姻和生育的女性所受到的不平等待遇；和西蒙·德·波伏瓦的《第二性》(1949)，其中有一个重要的部分是关于 DH 劳伦斯小说中女性形象的。男性对这一女权主义写作传统的贡献包括约翰·斯图尔特·穆勒 (John Stuart Mill) 的《妇女的屈从》 (1869) 和弗里德里希·恩格斯 (Friedrich Engels) 的《家庭的起源》( The Origin of the Family ) (1884)。

The ‘women’s movement’ of the 1960s was not, of course, the start of feminism. Rather, it was a renewal of an old tradition of thought and action already possessing its classic books which had diagnosed the problem of women’s inequality in society, and (in some cases) proposed solutions. These books include Mary Wollstonecraft’s A Vindication of the Rights of Women (1792), which discusses male writers like Milton, Pope, and Rousseau; Olive Schreiner’s Women and Labour (1911); Virginia Woolf’s A Room of One’s Own (1929), which vividly portrays the unequal treatment given to women seeking education and alternatives to marriage and motherhood; and Simone de Beauvoir’s The Second Sex (1949), which has an important section on the portrayal of women in the novels of D. H. Lawrence. Male contributions to this tradition of feminist writing include John Stuart Mill’s The Subjection of Women (1869) and The Origin of the Family (1884) by Friedrich Engels.

今天的女权主义文学批评是 1960 年代“妇女运动”的直接产物。在重要的方面，这场运动从一开始就是文学的，因为它意识到文学所传播的女性形象的重要性，并认为与她们作斗争并质疑她们的权威和连贯性至关重要。从这个意义上说，妇女运动一直与书籍和文学密切相关，因此女权主义批评不应被视为远离运动最终目标的女权主义的分支或衍生品，而是作为影响日常行为和态度的最实用的方法之一。

The feminist literary criticism of today is the direct product of the ‘women’s movement’ of the 1960s. This movement was, in important ways, literary from the start, in the sense that it realised the significance of the images of women promulgated by literature, and saw it as vital to combat them and question their authority and their coherence. In this sense the women’s movement has always been crucially concerned with books and literature, so that feminist criticism should not be seen as an off-shoot or a spin-off from feminism which is remote from the ultimate aims of the movement, but as one of its most practical ways of influencing everyday conduct and attitudes.

对“条件反射”和“社会化”的关注支撑了一系列重要的区别——即“女权主义者”、“女性”和“女性”等术语之间的区别。正如 Toril Moi 解释的那样，第一个是“政治立场”，第二个是“生物学问题”，第三个是“一组文化定义的特征”。特别是在第二个和第三个之间的区别中，女权主义的力量很大（见莫伊在女权主义读物中的文章，凯瑟琳贝尔西和简摩尔编辑）。其他重要思想在本节其余部分的适当部分进行了解释。

The concern with ‘conditioning’ and ‘socialisation’ underpins a crucial set of distinctions – that between the terms ‘feminist’, ‘female’, and ‘feminine’. As Toril Moi explains, the first is ‘a political position’, the second ‘a matter of biology’, and the third ‘a set of culturally defined characteristics’. Particularly in the distinction between the second and third of these lies much of the force of feminism (see Moi’s essay in The Feminist Reader, ed. Catherine Belsey and Jane Moore). Other important ideas are explained in the appropriate part of the remainder of this section.

因此，女性在文学中的表现被认为是最重要的“社会化”形式之一，因为它提供了榜样，向女性和男性表明什么是可接受的“女性化”和合法女性化版本目标和愿望。例如，女权主义者指出，在 19 世纪的小说中，很少有女性为了谋生而工作，除非她们迫于迫不得已。取而代之的，是女主人公对婚姻对象的选择，这将决定她最终的社会地位，也完全决定了她生活中的幸福感和成就感，或者缺乏这些。

The representation of women in literature, then, was felt to be one of the most important forms of ‘socialisation’, since it provided the role models which indicated to women, and men, what constituted acceptable versions of the ‘feminine’ and legitimate feminine goals and aspirations. Feminists pointed out, for example, that in nineteenth-century fiction very few women work for a living, unless they are driven to it by dire necessity. Instead, the focus of interest is on the heroine’s choice of marriage partner, which will decide her ultimate social position and exclusively determine her happiness and fulfilment in life, or her lack of these.

因此，在 20 世纪 70 年代的女权主义批评中，主要的努力是揭露所谓的父权制机制，即使性别不平等长期存在的男性和女性的文化“思维定势”。男性作家的作品受到了批判性的关注，其中构建了有影响力或典型的女性形象。必然地，进行这项工作的批评是好斗的和好辩的。然后，在 20 世纪 80 年代，女权主义和其他批评方法一样，情绪发生了变化。首先，女权主义批评变得更加折衷，这意味着它开始借鉴其他类型批评的发现和方法——马克思主义、结构主义、语言学等。第二，它的重点从攻击男性世界转向探索女性世界和观点的本质，并重建丢失或被压抑的女性经历记录。第三，注意力转移到通过重写小说和诗歌的历史来构建女性写作的新经典的需要，从而使被忽视的女性作家得到新的重视。

Thus, in feminist criticism in the 1970s the major effort went into exposing what might be called the mechanisms of patriarchy, that is, the cultural ‘mind-set’ in men and women which perpetuated sexual inequality. Critical attention was given to books by male writers in which influential or typical images of women were constructed. Necessarily, the criticism which undertook this work was combative and polemical. Then, in the 1980s, in feminism as in other critical approaches, the mood changed. Firstly, feminist criticism became much more eclectic, meaning that it began to draw upon the findings and approaches of other kinds of criticism – Marxism, structuralism, linguistics, and so on. Secondly, it switched its focus from attacking male versions of the world to exploring the nature of the female world and outlook, and reconstructing the lost or suppressed records of female experience. Thirdly, attention was switched to the need to construct a new canon of women’s writing by rewriting the history of the novel and of poetry in such a way that neglected women writers were given new prominence.

这种兴趣和活动的不同阶段似乎是女权主义批评的特征。例如，Elaine Showalter 将 70 年代后期的变化描述为注意力从“androtexts”（男性书籍）转移到“gynotexts”（女性书籍）。她创造了“gynocritics”这个词，意思是对女性文本的研究，但 gynocriticism 是一个广泛而多样的领域，任何关于它的概括都应该谨慎对待。她说，女性批评的主题是“女性写作的历史、风格、主题、体裁和结构；女性创造力的心理动力学；个人或集体女性职业生涯的轨迹；以及女性文学传统的演变或规律”。

Such distinct phases of interest and activity seem characteristic of feminist criticism. Elaine Showalter, for instance, described the change in the late 1970s as a shift of attention from ‘androtexts’ (books by men) to ‘gynotexts’ (books by women). She coined the term ‘gynocritics’, meaning the study of gynotexts, but gynocriticism is a broad and varied field, and any generalisations about it should be treated with caution. The subjects of gynocriticism are, she says, ‘the history, styles, themes, genres, and structures of writing by women; the psychodynamics of female creativity; the trajectory of the individual or collective female career; and the evolution or laws of a female literary tradition’.

Showalter 还在女性写作史上发现了一个女性化阶段（1840-80 年），在这个阶段，女性作家模仿占主导地位的男性艺术规范和审美标准；然后是女权主义阶段（1880-1920），在这个阶段，激进的和经常是分离主义的立场得到维持；最后是女性阶段（1920 年起）特别关注女性写作和女性经历。喜欢“分阶段”的原因很复杂：部分原因是，如果女权主义批评要获得理论上的尊重，就需要一个术语。更重要的是，在所有知识学科中，都非常需要建立一种进步感，使（在这种情况下）女权主义批评的早期和粗略的例子得到应有的信任和承认，同时明确他们所代表的方法不再被普遍视为实践的典范。

Showalter also detects in the history of women’s writing a feminine phase (1840–80), in which women writers imitated dominant male artistic norms and aesthetic standards; then a feminist phase (1880–1920), in which radical and often separatist positions are maintained; and finally a female phase (1920 onwards) which looked particularly at female writing and female experience. The reasons for this liking for ‘phasing’ are complex: partly, it is the result of the view that feminist criticism required a terminology if it was to attain theoretical respectability. More importantly, there is a great need, in all intellectual disciplines, to establish a sense of progress, enabling early and cruder examples of (in this case) feminist criticism to be given their rightful credit and acknowledgement while at the same time making it clear that the approach they represent is no longer generally regarded as a model for practice.

但 20 世纪 70 年代以来的女权主义批评因其内部存在的广泛立场而引人注目。争论和分歧集中在三个特定领域，即： 1. 理论的作用；2. 语言的本质，以及 3. 精神分析的价值与否。接下来的三个部分将依次查看其中的每一个。

But feminist criticism since the 1970s has been remarkable for the wide range of positions that exist within it. Debates and disagreements have centred on three particular areas, these being: 1. the role of theory; 2. the nature of language, and 3. the value or otherwise of psychoanalysis. The next three sections will look at each of these in turn.

女权主义批评与理论的作用

Feminist criticism and the role of theory

女权主义批评中的一个主要分歧是关于应该包含在其中的理论的数量和类型的分歧。通常被称为“英美”版本的女权主义往往对最近的批判理论持怀疑态度，并且与“法国”女权主义者相比，在使用它时更加谨慎，她们采用并改编了大量（主要是）后结构主义和精神分析批评作为其大部分工作的基础。“英裔美国人”（并非所有人都是英国人或美国人）对主题、母题和人物塑造等传统批判概念保持着浓厚兴趣。他们似乎接受了文学现实主义的惯例，将文学视为一系列女性生活和经历的表现，可以根据现实进行衡量和评价。她们将对个别文学文本的细读和阐释视为女权主义批评的主要业务。一般来说，这种女权主义批评与自由人文主义文学方法的程序和假设有很多共同点，尽管女权主义者也相当重视历史数据和非文学材料（如日记、回忆录、社会和医学史）在理解文学文本时的使用。美国评论家伊莱恩·肖沃尔特通常被认为是这种方法的主要代表，但其他范例还有桑德拉·吉尔伯特和苏珊·古柏、帕特里夏·斯塔布斯和雷切尔·布朗斯坦。

A major division within feminist criticism has concerned disagreements about the amount and type of theory that should feature in it. What is usually called the ‘Anglo-American’ version of feminism has tended to be more sceptical about recent critical theory, and more cautious in using it, than have the ‘French’ feminists, who have adopted and adapted a great deal of (mainly) post-structuralist and psychoanalytic criticism as the basis of much of their work. The ‘Anglo-Americans’ (not all are English or American) maintain a major interest in traditional critical concepts like theme, motif, and characterisation. They seem to accept the conventions of literary realism, and treat literature as a series of representations of women’s lives and experience which can be measured and evaluated against reality. They see the close reading and explication of individual literary texts as the major business of feminist criticism. Generally, this kind of feminist criticism has a good deal in common with the procedures and assumptions of the liberal humanist approach to literature, although feminists also place considerable emphasis on the use of historical data and non-literary material (such as diaries, memoirs, social and medical history) in understanding the literary text. The American critic Elaine Showalter is usually taken as the major representative of this approach, but other exemplars would be Sandra Gilbert and Susan Gubar, Patricia Stubbs, and Rachel Brownstein.

然而，其中大部分实际上是美国人而不是“盎格鲁”，这应该让我们质疑这个被广泛接受的类别的用处。毕竟，英国女性主义批评往往与美国截然不同：它在取向上倾向于“社会主义女性主义”，与文化唯物主义或马克思主义结盟，因此试图将其同化为“非理论”显然不能令人满意。类别。某些总结女权主义批评的流行书籍（如 KK Ruthven 的《女权主义文学研究：导论》和 Toril Moi 的《性/文本政治》）并未将其作为一个独特的类别进行讨论，因此这种女权主义的存在相当模糊。这类作品的例子有：特里·洛弗尔 (Terry Lovell) 的消费小说(1987)、朱莉娅·斯温德尔 (Julia Swindells) 的《维多利亚时代的写作与职业女性》 (1985)，以及美国人科拉·卡普兰 (Cora Kaplan) 的《巨变：文化与女权主义》(1986)，她在英国工作多年。卡普兰是马克思主义女权主义文学团体的成员，这个重要团体的存在本身就表明这种女权主义批评具有强烈的政治和理论兴趣。一个同样重要的团体是文学教学政治集体，它也是一系列会议和一个相关期刊。与这一群体相关的一个重要人物是凯瑟琳·贝尔西，她的著作（如《悲剧的主题》（1985 年）和约翰·弥尔顿：《语言、性别、权力》（1988 年））都是英国社会主义女权主义传统的一部分。虽然所谓的“英美”传统的决定性作品出现在 70 年代后期，但英国的“社会主义女权主义”传统在 80 年代中期产生了其主要作品，并且仍然活跃和有影响力。

However, most of these are in fact American rather than ‘Anglo’, and this should make us question the usefulness of this widely accepted category. English feminist criticism is, after all, often distinctly different from American: it tends to be ‘socialist feminist’ in orientation, aligned with cultural materialism or Marxism, so that it is obviously unsatisfactory to try to assimilate it into a ‘non-theoretical’ category. The existence of this kind of feminism has been rather obscured by the fact that certain popular books summarising feminist criticism (like K. K. Ruthven’s Feminist Literary Studies: An Introduction and Toril Moi’s Sexual/Textual Politics) do not discuss it as a distinct category. Examples of this kind of work are: Terry Lovell’s Consuming Fiction (1987), Julia Swindells’s Victorian Writing and Working Women (1985), and Sea Changes: Culture and Feminism (1986) by Cora Kaplan, an American who worked in Britain for many years. Kaplan was a member of the Marxist Feminist Literature Collective, an important group whose very existence indicates the strong political and theoretical interests of this kind of feminist criticism. A similarly important group was the Literature Teaching Politics Collective, which was also a series of conferences and an associated journal. An important figure associated with this group is Catherine Belsey, whose books (such as The Subject of Tragedy (1985), and John Milton: Language, Gender, Power (1988)) are part of this same socialist feminist British tradition. While the definitive works in the so-called ‘Anglo-American’ tradition appeared in the late 1970s, the British ‘socialist feminist’ tradition produced its key works in the mid-1980s and remains active and influential.

与美国人相反（如果不是，正如我们刚才所说，与英国相比），“法国”女权主义的工作更明显地是理论性的，以主要后结构主义者的见解为出发点，尤其是拉康、福柯和德里达。对于这些女权主义批评家来说，文学文本从来都不是现实的代表，也不是表达个人经历细节的个人声音的再现。事实上，法国理论家们经常处理文学以外的问题：他们写的是语言、表现和心理学本身，并且经常在进入文学文本本身之前对这类主要哲学问题进行详细的处理。在这个“法国”一方的主要人物是 Julia Kristeva（实际上是保加利亚人，

In contrast to the Americans (if not, as we have just argued, to the British) the work of ‘French’ feminism is more overtly theoretical, taking as its starting-point the insights of major post-structuralists, especially Lacan, Foucault and Derrida. For these feminist critics, the literary text is never primarily a representation of reality, or a reproduction of a personal voice expressing the minutiae of personal experience. Indeed, the French theorists often deal with concerns other than literature: they write about language, representation, and psychology as such and often travel through detailed treatments of major philosophical issues of this kind before coming to the literary text itself. The major figures on this ‘French’ side of the divide are Julia Kristeva (actually Bulgarian, though regarded abroad – as she has ruefully said – as a kind of embodiment of French intellectualism), Hélène Cixous (Algerian-born), and Luce Irigaray.

所有这三者最初都是在现在可用的各种女权主义读物中遇到的。例如，Kristeva 1974 年的访谈“女人永远无法被定义”收录在新法国女权主义（Marks 和 De Courtivron）中，西苏的“Sorties”和“The Laugh of the Medusa”中的部分以及 Irigaray 的“The Sex Which ”中的部分也是如此不是一个。Cixous 和 Irigaray 的同一篇文章的摘录也收录在Feminisms: A Reader (Maggie Humm) 中。

All three are best encountered initially in the various feminist readers now available. For instance, Kristeva’s 1974 interview ‘Woman can never be defined’ is in New French Feminisms (Marks and De Courtivron), as are sections from ‘Sorties’ and ‘The Laugh of the Medusa’ by Cixous, and sections from Irigaray’s The Sex Which is Not One. Extracts from the same Cixous and Irigaray pieces are also in Feminisms: A Reader (Maggie Humm).

关于“英美”和“法国”女权主义之间差异的持续讨论（尽管后者在很大程度上是后者）是 Toril Moi 的性/文本政治。有关最近的描述，请参阅 Ann Rosalind Jones 在“不断变化的主题：女性主义文学批评的形成”（格林和卡恩）中的“想象中的花园，里面有真正的青蛙：女性主义的欣快感和法美分歧，1976-1988”一章。这些法国女权主义者特别关注语言和心理，以下两节将对此进行探讨。

A sustained discussion of the differences between ‘Anglo-American’ and ‘French’ feminisms (though one which is much on the side of the latter) is Toril Moi’s Sexual/Textual Politics. For a more recent account see the chapter ‘Imaginary gardens with real frogs in them: feminist euphoria and the Franco-American divide, 1976–1988’ by Ann Rosalind Jones in Changing Subjects: The Making of Feminist Literary Criticism (Greene and Kahn). These French feminists are particularly concerned with language and psychology, which are considered in the two following sections.

女权主义批评和语言

Feminist criticism and language

另一个意见同样两极分化的基本问题是是否存在一种天生女性化的语言形式。女权主义内部对这个问题的争论由来已久。例如，弗吉尼亚·伍尔夫（在她的论战论文《一间自己的房间》的第四和第五节中) 表明语言的使用是性别化的，因此当一位女性转向小说写作时，她发现“没有可供她使用的常用句子”。伟大的男性小说家写出了“自然的散文，轻快但不邋遢，富有表现力但不珍贵，具有自己的色彩但仍是共同财产”。她引用了一个例子并说“这是一个男人的句子”。她没有明确说明它的特点，但这个例子的特点似乎是精心平衡和有规律的修辞序列。但是“这是一个不适合女性使用的句子”，尝试使用它的女作家（夏洛特·勃朗特、乔治·艾略特）表现不佳。简·奥斯汀拒绝了它，而是“设计了一个完全自然、适合她自己使用的优美句子”，但这没有被描述或举例说明。据推测，虽然，

Another fundamental issue, on which opinion is just as polarised, is the question of whether or not there exists a form of language which is inherently feminine. There is a long-standing tradition of debate on this issue within feminism. For instance, Virginia Woolf (in sections four and five of her extended polemical essay A Room of One’s Own) suggests that language use is gendered, so that when a woman turns to novel writing she finds that there is ‘no common sentence ready for her use’. The great male novelists have written ‘a natural prose, swift but not slovenly, expressive but not precious, taking their own tint without ceasing to be common property’. She quotes an example and says ‘That is a man’s sentence’. She doesn’t make its qualities explicit, but the example seems to be characterised by carefully balanced and patterned rhetorical sequences. But ‘it was a sentence unsuited for a woman’s use’, and women writers trying to use it (Charlotte Brontë, George Eliot) fared badly. Jane Austen rejected it and instead ‘devised a perfectly natural, shapely sentence proper for her own use’, but this is not described or exemplified. Presumably, though, the characteristics of a ‘woman’s sentence’ are that the clauses are linked in looser sequences, rather than carefully balanced and patterned as in male prose.

一般来说，女性作家被视为不得不使用一种本质上是为男性目的而设计的男性工具的媒介（散文写作）的障碍。戴尔·斯彭德 (Dale Spender) 于 1980 年代初在她的《人造语言》( Man Made Language , 1981)一书中提出了这种语言在这个意义上是“男性化”的论点，该书还认为语言不是一种中性的媒介，而是一种包含许多反映其作用的特征的媒介作为父权制表达的工具。（Sandra Gilbert 和 Susan Gubar 在论文“性语言学：性别、语言、性”中从女权主义内部挑战了这种语言是人造的观点，转载于女权主义读者编辑。Catherine Belsey 和 Jane Moore (Macmillan, 1989)。）如果规范语言可以被视为在某种程度上以男性为导向，那么就会出现一个问题，即是否存在一种没有这种偏见的语言形式，或者甚至在某种程度上以女性为导向。因此，法国理论家，假设存在一个écriture féminine（这个词是法国理论家 Hélène Cixous 的词，出自她的论文“美杜莎的笑声”），与女性相关，并在宽松的语法框架内促进意义的自由发挥结构。西苏散文的强化散文既证明又解释了这一点：

Generally, then, the female writer is seen as suffering the handicap of having to use a medium (prose writing) which is essentially a male instrument fashioned for male purposes. This thesis that the language is ‘masculine’ in this sense is developed by Dale Spender in the early 1980s in her book Man Made Language (1981) which also argues that language is not a neutral medium but one which contains many features which reflect its role as the instrument through which patriarchy finds expression. (This view that the language is man-made is challenged from within feminism by Sandra Gilbert and Susan Gubar in the essay ‘Sexual Linguistics: Gender, Language, Sexuality’, reprinted in The Feminist Reader ed. Catherine Belsey and Jane Moore (Macmillan, 1989).) If normative language can be seen as in some way male-oriented, the question arises of whether there might be a form of language which is free from this bias, or even in some way oriented towards the female. French theorists, therefore, have posited the existence of an écriture féminine (the term is that of the French theorist Hélène Cixous, from her essay ‘The Laugh of the Medusa’), associated with the feminine, and facilitating the free play of meanings within the framework of loosened grammatical structures. The heightened prose of the Cixous essay both demonstrates and explains it:

不可能定义一种女性写作实践，而且这种可能性将一直存在，因为这种实践永远无法被理论化、封闭、编码……它总是会超越规范男性中心主义（男性主导）系统的话语；它确实并将发生在那些受哲学理论支配的地区以外的地区。它将由打破自动化的主体、任何权威都无法征服的边缘人物来构想。
It is impossible to define a feminine practice of writing, and this is an impossibility which will remain, for this practice can never be theorized, enclosed, coded … it will always surpass the discourse that regulates the phallocentric [male-dominated] system; it does and will take place in areas other than those subordinated to philosophico-theoretical domination. It will be conceived of by subjects who are breakers of automatisms, by peripheral figures that no authority can ever subjugate.

（Marks 和 de Courtivron，新法国女权主义收割机，1981 年）

(Marks and de Courtivron, New French Feminisms Harvester, 1981)

在这里，écriture féminine的使用者似乎存在于逻辑之外的领域（“这种实践永远无法被理论化……并且将发生在那些从属于哲学理论统治的领域之外的领域”）。使用这种语言的人被视为在永远反对的无政府状态（“任何权威都无法征服的边缘人物”）狙击权力中心的常年自由斗士。对于西苏（虽然不是其他理论家）来说，这种写作在某种程度上是女性生理学的独特产物，女性必须在她们的写作中庆祝这一点：

Here the user of écriture féminine seems to exist in a realm beyond logic (‘this practice can never be theorized … and will take place in areas other than those subordinated to philosophico-theoretical domination’). The user of such language is seen as a kind of perennial freedom-fighter in an anarchic realm of perpetual opposition (‘peripheral figures that no authority can ever subjugate’) sniping at the centres of power. For Cixous (though not for other theorists) this kind of writing is somehow uniquely the product of female physiology, which women must celebrate in their writing:

妇女必须通过她们的身体来写作，她们必须发明一种坚不可摧的语言来破坏分裂、阶级、修辞、规则和准则，她们必须淹没、突破、超越最终的保留话语，包括那些嘲笑自己的话语念出“沉默”这个词的想法……这就是女性的力量，扫除句法，打破那条著名的线（他们说只是一根很小的线），它对男性来说就像一根脐带的替代品。
Women must write through their bodies, they must invent the impregnable language that will wreck partitions, classes, and rhetorics, regulations and codes, they must submerge, cut through, get beyond the ultimate reserve-discourse, including the one that laughs at the very idea of pronouncing the word ‘silence’ … Such is the strength of women that, sweeping away syntax, breaking that famous thread (just a tiny little thread, they say) which acts for men as a surrogate umbilical cord.

（Marks 和 de Courtivron，第 256 页）

(Marks and de Courtivron, p. 256)

那么，女性书写就其本质而言是越界的、超越规则的、陶醉的，但很明显，西苏提出的概念引发了许多问题。身体的领域，对于例如，被视为对社会和性别条件（“修辞、法规、准则”）具有某种免疫力（“坚不可摧”），并且能够散发出纯粹的女性本质。这种“本质主义”很难与强调女性气质是一种社会建构的女权主义相一致，而不是某种神秘地“存在”的给定实体。如果女性气质是社会建构的，那么它必然会因一种文化而异，因此关于它的这种总体概括是不可能的。我们可能会问，这些“必须”通过自己的身体写作的女性是谁？谁将这种强制性的“必须”强加给他们，（最重要的）为什么？

Ecriture féminine, then, is by its nature transgressive, rule-transcending, intoxicated, but it is clear that the notion as put forward by Cixous raises many problems. The realm of the body, for instance, is seen as somehow immune (‘impregnable’) to social and gender conditioning (‘rhetorics, regulations, codes’) and able to issue forth a pure essence of the feminine. Such ‘essentialism’ is difficult to square with a feminism which emphasises femininity as a social construct, not a given entity which is somehow just mysteriously ‘there’. And if femininity is socially constructed then it must follow that it differs from one culture to another, so that such overarching generalisations about it are impossible. Who, we might ask, are these women who ‘must’ write through their bodies? Who imposes this coercive ‘must’ upon them, and (above all) why?

在朱莉娅·克里斯蒂娃 (Julia Kristeva) 的著作中可以找到女性写作概念的进一步表达。Kristeva 使用符号学和符号学术语指定语言的两个不同方面。在她的文章“系统和说话的主体”中，象征方面与权威、秩序、父亲、压制和控制相关（“家庭、常态、规范的古典心理倾向话语，所有这些都是法西斯意识形态”）。语言的这一象征性方面维持了自我是固定和统一的虚构（她将其描述为“一种具有封闭主体或先验主体自我的语言”）。相比之下，话语的符号学方面的特征不是逻辑和顺序，而是“位移、滑移、凝结”，这再次表明，一种更松散、更随机的建立联系的方式，增加了可用的可能性范围. 她在蒂迈欧书中引用柏拉图的话调用“先于语言的语言状态……柏拉图称之为合唱”，而且，它再次与母性而非父性相关联。所有这些都是在相当笼统的层面上呈现的，但克里斯蒂娃将符号学视为诗歌的语言而不是散文，并考察了它在特定诗人作品中的运作。虽然它在概念上与女性联系在一起，但使用它的诗人并不都是女性，事实上，克里斯蒂娃的主要榜样是男性作家。

Further expression of the notion of the écriture féminine is found in the writing of Julia Kristeva. Kristeva uses the terms the symbolic and the semiotic to designate two different aspects of language. In her essay ‘The System and the Speaking Subject’ the symbolic aspect is associated with authority, order, fathers, repression and control (‘the family, normalcy, normative classico-psychological-tending discourse, all of which are just so many characteristics of fascist ideology’). This symbolic facet of language maintains the fiction that the self is fixed and unified (what she describes as ‘a language with a foreclosed subject or with a transcendental subject-ego’). By contrast, the semiotic aspect of discourse is characterised not by logic and order, but by ‘displacement, slippage, condensation’, which suggests, again, a much looser, more randomised way of making connections, one which increases the available range of possibilities. She quotes Plato in the Timaeus invoking ‘a state of language anterior to the Word … Plato calls this the chora’, and, again, it is linked with the maternal rather than the paternal. All this is presented at a fairly generalised level, but Kristeva sees the semiotic as the language of poetry as opposed to prose, and examines its operation in the work of specific poets. Though it is linked conceptually with the feminine, the poets who use it are not all female, and in fact Kristeva’s major exemplars are male writers.

不过，应该强调的是，符号语言和符号语言并不是两种不同的语言，而是语言的两个不同方面，这两个方面总是出现在任何给定的样本中。同样，模型是无意识和有意识的模型，以及拉康对这些概念的再利用。象征性的是有序的表面语言运作的严格区分和固定结构的领域：语言的这一方面是结构主义者强调的一面，即索绪尔的“差异网络”。但永远存在的是语言的“无意识”，一个由浮动的能指、随机连接、即兴创作、近似、意外和“滑移”组成的领域——也就是说，一切都包含在后结构主义语言观中。事实上，描述解构过程（由此在文本中发现意义的矛盾交叉流）的一种方式是将其视为文本的“无意识”出现并破坏“有意识”或“表面”意义。这些对理性的、先前稳定的结构的破坏性入侵在例如梦境、诗歌和现代主义、扭曲语言表面的实验性写作（例如，ee cummings 的诗歌）。即使是最细致、最痛苦地深思熟虑的散文作曲家也永远无法逃避这种“随机”因素。显然，由于语言根据定义是一种创造性和即兴的实践，如果与克里斯蒂娃的符号学领域隔绝，它就会立即消失。

It should be stressed, though, that the symbolic and the semiotic are not two different kinds of language, but two different aspects of language, both of which are always present in any given sample. The model, again, is that of the unconscious and the conscious, and the Lacanian re-use of these notions. The symbolic is the orderly surface realm of strict distinctions and laid-down structures through which language works: this aspect of language is the side stressed by the structuralists, the Saussurean ‘network of differences’. But ever-present is the linguistic ‘unconscious’, a realm of floating signifiers, random connections, improvisations, approximations, accidents, and ‘slippage’ – everything, that is, entailed in the post-structuralist view of language. Indeed, one way of characterising the process of deconstruction (whereby contradictory cross-currents of meaning are discovered in texts) is to see it as the ‘unconscious’ of the text emerging into and disrupting the ‘conscious’ or ‘surface’ meaning. These disruptive incursions into rational, previously stable structures are seen, for instance, in dreams, in poetry, and in modernist, experimental writing which distorts the surface of language (for example, the poetry of e. e. cummings). This ‘random’ element can never be escaped by even the most meticulous and painfully deliberate composer of prose. Clearly, since language is by definition an inventive and improvisatory practice, if cut off from Kristeva’s realm of the semiotic it would instantly perish.

克里斯蒂娃的符号学和象征学之间基本对立的概念得益于雅克·拉康以及他对想象界和象征界这两个领域的区分。想象界是处于前语言、前俄狄浦斯阶段的幼儿。自我与非我还未分别，身体与外界的分离感还未建立。孩子生活在伊甸园般的境界中，既没有欲望也没有剥夺。符号学在政治上被视为天生具有颠覆性，并且总是威胁着封闭的符号秩序，这些秩序体现在诸如政府、公认的文化价值观和标准语言语法等习俗中。

For her notion of the basic opposition between the semiotic and the symbolic Kristeva is indebted to Jacques Lacan and his distinction between two realms, the Imaginary and the Symbolic. The Imaginary realm is that of the young child at the pre-linguistic, pre-Oedipal stage. The self is not yet distinguished from what is other than the self, and the body’s sense of being separate from the rest of the world is not yet established. The child lives in an Edenlike realm, free of both desire and deprivation. The semiotic is seen as inherently subversive politically, and always threatens the closed symbolic order embodied in such conventions as governments, received cultural values, and the grammar of standard language.

对于一些女权主义者来说，这种由西苏和克里斯蒂娃唤起的富有远见的“符号学”女性世界和语言是一个充满可能性的重要剧院，其价值在于娱乐我们现在所拥有的世界，尤其是女性现在所拥有的世界的其他选择。 . 对于其他人来说，它致命地将理性世界交给了男性，并为女性保留了传统上感性、直觉、超理性和“私有化”的舞台。因此，毫不奇怪，语言问题是女权主义批评中最具争议的领域之一。

For some feminists this visionary ‘semiotic’ female world and language evoked by Cixous and Kristeva is a vital theatre of possibilities, the value of which is to entertain the imagining of alternatives to the world which we now have, and which women in particular now have. For others, it fatally hands over the world of the rational to men and reserves for women a traditionally emotive, intuitive, trans-rational and ‘privatised’ arena. Not surprisingly, therefore, the language question is one of the most contentious areas of feminist criticism.

女权主义批评与精神分析

Feminist criticism and psychoanalysis

到目前为止，关于女权主义与精神分析的关系的故事大体上很简单，但细微之处却很复杂。这个故事可以说是从 1969 年凯特·米利特 (Kate Millett) 的性政治开始的，该书谴责弗洛伊德是女权主义者必须与之抗争的父权态度的主要来源。这种观点在女权主义中的影响仍然很大，但弗洛伊德在随后几年的一系列重要著作中得到了辩护，尤其是朱丽叶米切尔的《精神分析与女权主义》1974 年。这本书通过实际上使用 Millett 自己的术语和概念来为弗洛伊德辩护，反对 Millett或获得的，而不是“自然的”。这种区别正是西蒙娜·德·波伏娃在《第二性》（1949 年）第二部分著名的第一句话中所援引的，她写道：相反，一个人变成了女人。de Beauvoir 的书的项目是性政治认为自己在继续。那么，米切尔为弗洛伊德辩护的理由是，弗洛伊德并没有将女性呈现为简单的“既定和自然”的东西。女性性欲（实际上，一般意义上的异性恋）并不是从一开始就“自然”存在的，而是通过早期的经验和调整形成的，弗洛伊德展示了其产生和建构的过程，特别是在理论三论中性（在企鹅弗洛伊德的第七卷，题为论性）。因此，性别角色必须是可塑和可变的，而不是不可避免和不可改变的。

The story so far of feminism’s relationship with psychoanalysis is simple in outline but complex in nuance. The story can be said to begin, like so much else, with Kate Millett’s Sexual Politics in 1969 which condemns Freud as a prime source of the patriarchal attitudes against which feminists must fight. The influence of this view within feminism is still very strong, but Freud was defended in a series of important books in subsequent years, notably Juliet Mitchell’s Psychoanalysis and Feminism in 1974. This book defends Freud against Millett by, in effect, using Millett’s own terms and concepts, especially the distinction, so crucial to feminism, between sex and gender, the former being a matter of biology, the latter a construct, something learned or acquired, rather than ‘natural’. This distinction is what Simone de Beauvoir invokes in the famous first sentence in Part Two of The Second Sex (1949) when she writes ‘One is not born a woman; rather, one becomes a woman’. The project of de Beauvoir’s book is one which Sexual Politics sees itself as continuing. Mitchell’s defence of Freud, then, is to argue that Freud doesn’t present the feminine as something simply ‘given and natural’. Female sexuality (indeed, heterosexuality in general) isn’t just there ‘naturally’ from the start, but is formed by early experiences and adjustments, and Freud shows the process of its being produced and constructed, particularly in the Three Essays on the Theory of Sexuality (in volume seven of the Penguin Freud, entitled On Sexuality). It follows that gender roles must be malleable and changeable, not inevitable and unchangeable givens.

因此，论点是，阴茎嫉妒的概念不必简单地理解为与男性身体器官本身有关（无论弗洛伊德的意图是什么），而是将该器官视为社会权力的象征以及随之而来的优势. （我想起了一则被禁的广告，展示了一张裸体女人的照片，标题是“女人需要什么才能在男人的世界里取得成功”。照片中的女人的性器官被粗暴地套在了自己的身上。）在下一节讨论的阅读中，Sandra Gilbert 和 Susan Gubar 使用了“社会阉割”的概念，这相当于同一件事，因为这个词表示女性缺乏社会权力，这种缺乏被代表，通过“阉割”这个词，作为男性的财产，尽管在任何意义上都不是男性的属性。

Thus, the argument runs, the notion of penis envy need not be taken as simply concerning the male physical organ itself (whatever might have been Freud’s intentions), but as concerning that organ as an emblem of social power and the advantages which go with it. (I am reminded of an advertisement – which was banned – showing a photograph of a nude woman with the caption ‘What women need to succeed in a man’s world’. The woman shown had male sexual organs crudely drawn in over her own.) In the reading discussed in the next section, Sandra Gilbert and Susan Gubar use the idea of ‘social castration’, which amounts to the same thing, for this term signifies women’s lack of social power, this lack being represented, by means of the word ‘castration’, as a male possession, though not as in any sense a male attribute.

简·盖洛普 (Jane Gallop) 1982 年出版的《女性主义与精神分析》一书继续精神分析的康复，但从弗洛伊德的转向拉康的变体，部分原因是弗洛伊德经常隐含的东西在拉康的系统中是明确的，即阳具不是物理生物对象，而是权力的象征随之而来的。当然，虽然男人从拉康的作品中脱颖而出比女人更有优​​势，但拉康仍然表明男人也是无能为力的，因为男性或女性都无法获得意指的丰满，菲勒斯在拉康的作品中也代表了这一点。此外，拉康的写作方式——众所周知的深奥、俏皮、双关语和“超逻辑”（意思是超越或高于逻辑）——似乎体现了语言的“女性化”或“符号学”方面，而不是“男性化”或“符号化” ' 方面。

Jane Gallop’s 1982 book Feminism and Psychoanalysis continues the rehabiliation of psychoanalysis, but by switching from the Freudian to the Lacanian variety, partly on the grounds that what is often implicit in Freud is explicit in Lacan’s system, namely that the phallus is not the physical biological object but a symbol of the power which goes with it. While men, of course, come out of Lacan’s writings better advantaged than women, none the less Lacan shows men too as powerless, since the fullness of signification, which the phallus also represents in Lacan’s work, is not attainable by either men or women. Also, Lacan’s way of writing – notoriously abstruse, playful, punning, and ‘paralogical’ (meaning beyond or above logic) – seems to embody the ‘feminine’ or ‘semiotic’ aspect of language, rather than the ‘masculine’ or ‘symbolic’ aspect.

弗洛伊德康复的另一个重要人物是英国评论家杰奎琳·罗斯，她的书《困扰西尔维亚·普拉斯》是应用女权主义-精神分析方法的一个例子。罗斯的项目是结合女权主义、精神分析和政治的见解。她与朱丽叶·米切尔 (Juliet Mitchell) 共同编辑了女性性学：雅克·拉康 (Jacques Lacan) 和弗洛伊德学院(1982)。支持拉康和弗洛伊德的论点再次是，它表明性身份是一种“文化建构”，给出了一系列关于建构如何发生的详细“内部”描述，并展示了这种条件反射的例子被抵制。

Another significant name in the rehabilitation of Freud is the British critic Jacqueline Rose, whose book The Haunting of Sylvia Plath is an example of an applied feminist-psychoanalytic approach. Rose’s project is to combine the insights of feminism, psychoanalysis and politics. She is joint editor, with Juliet Mitchell, of Feminine Sexuality: Jacques Lacan and the école freudienne (1982). The argument in favour of Lacan, and of Freud, is, again, that it shows sexual identity to be a ‘cultural construct’, gives a detailed series of ‘insider’ accounts of how the construction takes place, and shows examples of this conditioning being resisted.

由此产生的立场（正如 Isobel Armstrong 在1993 年 7 月 16 日泰晤士高等教育副刊第 15 页关于罗斯的一篇文章中所评论的那样）是一个非常复杂的立场。总的来说，法国和英国的女权主义者比美国人更喜欢为弗洛伊德和拉康辩护（这是英美对法国二分法的又一次有趣的突破）。例如，伊莱恩·肖沃尔特 (Elaine Showalter) 在她关于奥菲莉亚的文章中（转载于牛顿的理论付诸实践——参见延伸阅读部分的一般读者）对拉康明显无视奥菲莉亚的行为不屑一顾——他承诺在他关于哈姆雷特的研讨会上讨论她，但不知何故永远不会解决它。同样，杰里·艾琳·弗莱格 (Jerry Aline Flieger) 是《改变主题：女权主义者的形成》的美国撰稿人 文学批评（格林和卡恩），她写道：

The resulting position is (as Isobel Armstrong remarks in a article about Rose in The Times Higher Education Supplement 16 July 1993, p. 15) a very complicated one. In general the defence of Freud and Lacan has been more favourably received by French and British feminists than by Americans (another interesting transgression of the usual Anglo-American versus French dichotomy). Elaine Showalter, for instance, in her essay about Ophelia (reprinted in Newton’s Theory into Practice – see under General readers in the Further reading section) is dismissive of Lacan’s evident disregard of Ophelia – he promises to discuss her in his seminar on Hamlet, but somehow never gets round to it. Likewise, Jerry Aline Flieger, an American contributor to Changing Subjects: The Making of Feminist Literary Criticism (Greene and Kahn), sounds a note of scepticism when she writes:

拉康将阳具描述为能指的能指，以及他臭名昭著的陈述“没有性关系”和“女人不存在”，这让我着迷和困扰。因此，当杰奎琳·罗斯 (Jacqueline Rose) 和简·盖洛普 (Jane Gallop) 等女权主义者在 70 年代末和 80 年代初对拉康进行巧妙而有说服力的解读时，我感到欣慰和感激，将其作为男性生殖器统治的批评者，而不是拥护者。
I was fascinated and troubled by Lacan’s characterisation of the phallus as the Signifier of Signifiers, as well as by his infamous statements ‘There is no sexual relation’, and ‘Woman does not exist’. Thus I was relieved and grateful when feminists such as Jacqueline Rose and Jane Gallop, in the late seventies and early eighties, performed ingenious and persuasive readings of Lacan as critic of phallocracy, rather than advocate.

（第 267 页）

(p. 267)

这一评论的部分作用是提请注意发起这样的辩护所需的独创性。

The effect of this comment is partly to draw attention to the ingenuity needed to mount such a defence.

斯蒂芬·希思 (Stephen Heath) 在女性主义文学批评（编者：玛丽·伊格尔顿 (Mary Eagleton)）的一篇文章中引用了罗兰·巴特 (Roland Barthes) 的话，大意是“必须跨越精神分析的丰碑——而不是绕过它”（第 214 页）). 我们可以说，女权主义是从尝试做后者开始的，然后改弦易辙，做了前者。美国女权主义者不相信精神分析的康复的趋势或许可以解释为精神分析在美国比在欧洲更成为中产阶级生活的一部分。因此，美国人更难认为它仍然具有激进的潜力，尤其是对女性而言。此外，1990 年代开始强调精神分析的特定文化性质，因此不愿宣称它具有任何普遍有效性。与其他地方一样，在罗斯自己的作品中，人们对倾听迄今为止被排斥的“他者”的声音产生了强烈且不断增长的兴趣，

Stephen Heath, in an essay in Feminist Literary Criticism (ed. Mary Eagleton) quotes Roland Barthes to the effect that ‘The monument of psychoanalysis must be traversed – not bypassed’ (p. 214). We might say that feminism began by trying to do the latter, then changed course and did the former. The tendency of American feminists to be unconvinced by the rehabilitation of psychoanalysis can perhaps be explained by the fact that psychoanalysis has been more an accepted part of middle-class life in the USA than it ever became in Europe. Hence, it is more difficult for Americans to see it as still possessed of radical potential, least of all for women. Further, there was a new emphasis in the 1990s on the culturally-specific nature of psychoanalysis, and hence a reluctance to claim any kind of universal validity for it. In Rose’s own work, as elsewhere, there is a strong and growing interest in listening to the voices of the hitherto excluded ‘Other’, particularly those of the cultures and races which had no place in the work of Freud or Lacan.

停下来想一想

STOP and THINK

概述：女权主义非常强调女性气质的“建构性”，即条件反射和社会化等问题，以及文学和文化中女性形象和表现的影响。所有这些表述都是避免“本质主义”的方式，这是相反的观点认为，女性有一些自然的、给定的本质，是普遍的、不可改变的。

General: Within feminism there is a strong emphasis on the ‘constructedness’ of femininity, that is, on such matters as conditioning and socialisation, and the influence of images and representations of femininity in literature and culture. All these formulations are ways of avoiding ‘essentialism’, which is the contrary view that there is some natural, given essence of the feminine, that is universal and unchangeable.

多年来，反本质主义一直是批判理论中的主导概念，但也有人意识到这一概念给我们带来了某些困难。例如，反本质主义是否让对女性的概括变得困难，是否也让将女性作为一个群体政治化变得困难？它是否倾向于将身份归结为环境的总和，也许尽管我们的“本能”感觉身份可能比这更深刻？我们有这样的感受的事实是否可以作为证据——无论是哪一方？无论如何，什么可以构成这个问题任何一方的证据？

Anti-essentialism has for some years now been a dominant concept in critical theory, but there is some awareness, too, that it is a notion which leaves us with certain difficulties. For instance, does anti-essentialism, by making it hard to make any generalisations about women, also make it difficult to politicise women as a group? Does it tend to reduce identity to the sum of circumstances, perhaps in spite of our ‘instinctive’ feelings that identity may be deeper than that? Is the fact that we have such feelings admissible as evidence – on either side? And in any case, what would consitute evidence on either side of this question?

具体：在下面讨论的例子中，关键假设和程序与非女权主义方法对同一作品的不同之处有哪些？将其与示例开头提到的两篇文章或 Macmillan Casebook on Wuthering Heights（ed. Miriam Allott，1970 年）中的文章进行比较。

Specific: In the example discussed below, what are some of the ways in which the critical assumptions and procedures differ from those made in non-feminist approaches to the same work? Compare it with the two essays mentioned at the start of the example, or with the pieces in the Macmillan Casebook on Wuthering Heights (ed. Miriam Allott, 1970).

女权主义批评家做什么

What feminist critics do

1. 重新思考经典，旨在重新发现女性所写的文本。

1. Rethink the canon, aiming at the rediscovery of texts written by women.

2. 重估女性的经验。

2. Revalue women’s experience.

3. 检查男性和女性在文学中对女性的描述。

3. Examine representations of women in literature by men and women.

4. 挑战将女性描述为“其他”、“缺乏”、“自然”的一部分。

4. Challenge representations of women as ‘Other’, as ‘lack’, as part of ‘nature’.

5. 审视文本和生活中获得的权力关系，以打破它们，将阅读视为一种政治行为，并显示父权制的程度。

5. Examine power relations which obtain in texts and in life, with a view to breaking them down, seeing reading as a political act, and showing the extent of patriarchy.

6. 认识到语言在使社会和建构的事物看起来透明和“自然”方面的作用。

6. Recognise the role of language in making what is social and constructed seem transparent and ‘natural’.

7. 提出男人和女人“本质上”不同是因为生物学原因还是社会建构不同的问题。

7. Raise the question of whether men and women are ‘essentially’ different because of biology, or are socially constructed as different.

8. 探索是否存在一种女性语言，一种女性文字，以及这是否也适用于男性。

8. Explore the question of whether there is a female language, an écriture feminine, and whether this is also available to men.

9.“重读”精神分析，进一步探讨女性和男性身份的问题。

9. ‘Re-read’ psychoanalysis to further explore the issue of female and male identity.

10. 质疑关于作者之死的流行观念，询问是否只有“主题立场……在话语中建构”，或者相反，体验（例如黑人或女同性恋作家的体验）是否才是核心。

10. Question the popular notion of the death of the author, asking whether there are only ‘subject positions … constructed in discourse’, or whether, on the contrary, the experience (e.g. of a black or lesbian writer) is central.

11. 明确所谓“中立”或“主流”文学解释的意识形态基础。

11. Make clear the ideological base of supposedly ‘neutral’ or ‘mainstream’ literary interpretations.

女权主义批评：一个例子

Feminist criticism: an example

作为女权主义批评的一个例子，我将以桑德拉·M·吉尔伯特和苏珊·古巴尔在他们的书《阁楼上的疯女人》中对呼啸山庄的描述为例。该作品在广泛使用的辩论文本（由 Rick Rylance 编辑）中转载。Rylance 重印了同一部小说的另外两篇文章，一篇是 QD Leavis 的，可能被认为是自由人文主义者，另一篇是 Frank Kermode 的，可能被视为后结构主义者。也可以与伊格尔顿在他的著作《权力的神话：对勃朗特姐妹的马克思主义研究》一书中对同一部小说的马克思主义描述进行比较，吉尔伯特和古巴尔也提到了这本书。

As an example of feminist criticism I will take the account of Wuthering Heights by Sandra M. Gilbert and Susan Gubar, from their book The Madwoman in the Attic. The piece is reprinted in the widely-used Debating Texts (ed. Rick Rylance). Rylance reprints two other accounts of the same novel, one by Q. D. Leavis, which might be considered as liberal humanist, and one by Frank Kermode which might be seen as post-structuralist. Comparisons can also be made with Eagleton’s Marxist account of the same novel in his book Myths of Power: A Marxist Study of the Brontës, to which Gilbert and Gubar refer.

Gilbert 和 Gubar 对勃朗特小说的策略是将其视为男性形式的女性版本，称为Bildungsroman（这个德语术语的意思是“形成”或“教育”小说），其中追溯了主人公成长为男子汉的过程，作为“胜利的自我发现”的过程，在此过程中，一个身份被发现，一个人生使命被构思并开始——一个经典的例子是詹姆斯·乔伊斯的青年艺术家的肖像。然而，对于女主人公来说，情况就不同了，一部同等的小说（比如《呼啸山庄》) 关于成长为女性的故事记录了一个“焦虑的自我否定”的过程，这是“女性教育的最终产物”。吉尔伯特和古巴尔说，“凯瑟琳或任何女孩必须学会的是，她不知道自己的名字，因此不知道她是谁，也不知道她注定要成为谁”。否认的过程被他们描述为“社会阉割”。实际上，凯瑟琳必须抛弃她所有的本能偏好，以高地为标志，并采取一种陌生的态度，以 Thrushcross Grange 为标志。这里“阉割”一词的要点是，为了获得可接受性和女性气质，凯瑟琳必须失去男人认为理所当然的权力，即掌握自己命运的权力。他们说，这是象征性的警犬，“紫色的舌头伸出嘴巴半英尺”，当凯瑟琳进入田庄时，它咬了凯瑟琳的脚，这是一种象征性的阉割。然后，她在田庄接受入狱仪式，类似于传统女英雄如珀耳塞福涅和白雪公主所经历的仪式。

Gilbert and Gubar’s strategy with Brontë’s novel is to see it as a female version of the male form known as the Bildungsroman (this German term means the ‘formation’ or ‘education’ novel) in which the hero’s growth to manhood is traced, as a process of ‘triumphant self-discovery’, whereby an identity is discovered and a mission in life conceived and embarked upon – a classic example would be James Joyce’s A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man. For the heroine, however, things are different, and an equivalent novel (like Wuthering Heights) about the growth to womanhood records a process of ‘anxious self-denial’, this being the ‘ultimate product of a female education’. Gilbert and Gubar say that ‘What Catherine, or any girl, must learn is that she does not know her own name, and therefore cannot know either who she is or whom she is destined to be’. The process of denial involved they describe as ‘social castration’. Effectively, Catherine has to leave behind all her instinctive preferences, signified by the Heights, and take on an alien attitude, signified by Thrushcross Grange. The point of the word ‘castration’ here is that in order to achieve acceptability and femininity Catherine has to lose the power which men take for granted, namely power over their own destiny. This is symbolised by the phallic guard-dog, ‘purple tongue hanging half a foot out of its mouth’, which bites Catherine’s foot as she enters the Grange, a symbolic castration, they say. She then undergoes the initiation ritual of imprisonment at the Grange, similar to that undergone by traditional heroines like Persephone and Snow White.

田庄是“隐蔽和双重性”的家园。在这里，她学会了，正如勃朗特所说，“采取双重性格而不完全是为了欺骗任何人”，也就是说，吉尔伯特和古巴尔说，她必须学会“压抑自己的冲动，必须用坚强的意志束缚自己的能量” “原因”'。这种“双重性教育”涉及“她人格的实际双重化或分裂化”，正如希思克利夫，“她反叛的另一个自我”被强行排除在她的生活之外。本着这种自我否定的精神，她同意嫁给埃德加，尽管她说希刺克厉夫“比我更像我自己”。在这个过程中，希刺克厉夫也堕落了，无能为力，所以凯瑟琳正确地了解到，如果做女人是可耻的，那么做女人就更可耻了一个女人'。因此，吉尔伯特和古巴尔反对运行呼啸山庄批评，埃德加并没有表现出与希刺克厉夫的男子气概形成鲜明对比的柔弱形象；相反，在无情地运用他的社会和性权力时，他是父权制原则的体现。婚姻“无情地将她锁在一个剥夺她自主权的社会制度中”，因此希斯克利夫的回归，“被压抑的回归”，正如我们用弗洛伊德的术语所说，“代表了她真实自我的欲望的回归，没有她以前的力量的重生”，因此不可避免地陷入自我拒绝（凯瑟琳无法认出镜子中自己的脸）、自我饥饿、疯狂和死亡，“一种几乎是典型的心理神经症综合症与女性的无力感和愤怒感相关”。因此，

The Grange is the home of ‘concealment and doubleness’. Here she learns, as Brontë says, ‘to adopt a double character without exactly intending to deceive anyone’, that is, say Gilbert and Gubar, she must learn ‘to repress her own impulses, must girdle her own energies with the iron stays of “reason”’. This ‘education in doubleness’ involves ‘an actual doubling or fragmentation of her personality’, as Heathcliff, ‘her rebellious alter-ego’ is forcibly excluded from her life. In this spirit of self-denial she agrees to marry Edgar, even though she says of Heathcliff that he is ‘more myself than I am’. In this process Heathcliff too is degraded and powerless, and so ‘Catherine has learned, correctly, that if it is degrading to be a woman it is even more degrading to be like a woman’. Hence, Gilbert and Gubar argue, against the run of Wuthering Heights criticism, that Edgar does not represent an image of effeminacy in contrast to the manliness of Heathcliff; on the contrary, in his ruthless employment of his social and sexual power, he is an embodiment of the patriarchal principle. The marriage ‘inexorably locks her into a social system which denies her autonomy’, so that Heath-cliff’s return, the ‘return of the repressed’, as we might call it in Freudian terms, ‘represents the return of her true self’s desires without the rebirth of her former powers’, hence the inevitable descent into self-rejection (Catherine fails to recognise her own face in the mirror), self-starvation, madness, and death, ‘a complex of psycho-neurotic symptoms that is almost classically associated with female feelings of powerlessness and rage’. Thus, the events of the novel are ‘strongly’ read as emblems of the construction of gender identity.

选读

Selected reading

读者

Readers

Belsey、Catherine 和 Moore，Jane 编着，女权主义读物：性别与文学批评政治论文（Palgrave，第 2 版，1997 年）。优秀的介绍。可管理的大小。关于关键问题的重要论文。

Belsey, Catherine and Moore, Jane, eds, The Feminist Reader: Essays in Gender and the Politics of Literary Criticism (Palgrave, 2nd edn, 1997). Excellent introduction. Manageable size. Important essays on the crucial issues.

Cavallaro, Dani，法国女权主义理论：简介（新版，Continuum，2006 年）。

该领域当前最好的关键论文集。

Cavallaro, Dani, French Feminist Theory: An Introduction (new edn, Continuum, 2006).

The best current collection of key essays in this field.

伊格尔顿，玛丽，编辑。女权主义文学批评（朗文出版社，1991 年）。有趣的合集，文章成对代表对关键问题的对立观点。非常好的社论评论。

Eagleton, Mary, ed. Feminist Literary Criticism (Longman, 1991). Interesting collection, with essays paired to represent opposing views on key issues. Very good editorial commentary.

伊格尔顿，玛丽，编辑。女权主义文学理论：读者（布莱克威尔，第 2 版，1995 年）。包括有关黑人女权主义和后现代主义对女权主义的影响的材料。

从广泛的关键材料中摘录的简短内容。

Eagleton, Mary, ed. Feminist Literary Theory: A Reader (Blackwell, 2nd edn, 1995). Includes material on black feminism and the impact of postmodernism on feminism.

Short extracts from a wide range of critical material.

弗里德曼，埃斯特尔 B.，编辑。基本女权主义读者（现代图书馆经典，2007）。

全面的收藏，包括历史经典和创意以及重要材料。

Freedman, Estelle B., ed. The Essential Feminist Reader (Modern Library Classics, 2007).

A comprehensive collection, including historical classics and creative as well as critical material.

嗯，玛姬，编辑。女权主义：读者（Longman，1992）。

一本关于从伍尔夫至今的女权主义，包括黑人和女同性恋女权主义的优秀书籍，内容广泛且易于理解。按类别细分，每个类别都有单独的介绍。

Humm, Maggie, ed. Feminisms: A Reader (Longman, 1992).

An excellent book, wide-ranging and accessible, on feminisms from Woolf to the present day, including black and lesbian feminisms. Sub-sectioned by category, with a separate introduction for each one.

Marks, Elaine 和 de Courtivron, Isabelle, eds, New French Feminisms (Harvester, 1981).

向英语读者介绍大部分此类材料的开创性著作。

Marks, Elaine and de Courtivron, Isabelle, eds, New French Feminisms (Harvester, 1981).

The pioneering book in introducing much of this material to English-speaking readers.

Moi, Toril，《法国女权主义思想：读者》（布莱克威尔出版社，1987 年）。

Moi, Toril, French Feminist Thought: A Reader (Blackwell, 1987).

鲁尼，艾伦，编辑。女权主义文学理论的剑桥伴侣（剑桥文学伴侣，2006 年）。

收录女性主义阅读美学、女性主义与小说阅读、女性主义与精神分析、女性主义与后殖民主义等非常有用的更新文章。

Rooney, Ellen, ed. The Cambridge Companion to Feminist Literary Theory (Cambridge Companions to Literature, 2006).

Contains extremely useful updating essays on feminist aesthetics of reading, feminism and novel reading, feminism and psychoanalysis, feminism and postcolonialism, etc.

一般的

General

Brownstein, Rachel, Becoming a Heroine（企鹅出版社，1982 年；报告，哥伦比亚大学出版社，1994 年）。

对成为“经典”小说中的女主角所需要的一切的可读性和深思熟虑的描述。

Brownstein, Rachel, Becoming a Heroine (Penguin, 1982; rpt. Columbia University Press, 1994).

A readable and thoughtful account of what it takes to become a heroine in a ‘classic’ novel.

Christian, Barbara，新黑人女权主义批评，1985-2000（伊利诺伊大学出版社，2007 年）。

主要实践者和理论家的合集，在她去世后由 Gloria Bowles、M. Giulia Fabi 和 Arlene Keizer 编辑。

Christian, Barbara, New Black Feminist Criticism, 1985-2000 (University of Illinois Press, 2007).

A collection by a major practitioner and theorist, edited after her death by Gloria Bowles, M. Giulia Fabi, and Arlene Keizer.

Gilbert, Sandra 和 Gubar, Susan, No Man's Land: The Place of the Women Writer in the Twentieth Century（耶鲁大学出版社，1988 年）。很感兴趣。见第七章，“女性、文学和第一次世界大战”，并与下一章中同性恋批评的例子进行比较。

Gilbert, Sandra and Gubar, Susan, No Man’s Land: The Place of the Woman Writer in the Twentieth Century (Yale University Press, 1988). Much of interest. See chapter seven, ‘Women, literature and the Great War’, and compare with the example of gay criticism in the next chapter.

Gilbert, Sandra 和 Gubar, Susan, The Madwoman in the Attic: The Women Writer and the Nineteenth Century Literary Imagination（耶鲁大学出版社，第 2 版，2000 年）。

一本著名的书，其中有关于奥斯丁、勃朗特丝、乔治·艾略特等人的章节。

Gilbert, Sandra and Gubar, Susan, The Madwoman in the Attic: The Woman Writer and the Nineteenth Century Literary Imagination (Yale University Press, 2nd edn, 2000).

A famous book with chapters on Austen, Brontës, George Eliot, etc.

Greene、Gayle 和 Kahn，Coppelia 编辑，Making a Difference: Feminist Literary Criticism (Routledge, 1985)。

Greene, Gayle and Kahn, Coppelia, eds, Making a Difference: Feminist Literary Criticism (Routledge, 1985).

Greene、Gayle 和 Kahn，Coppelia 编辑，改变主题：女性主义文学批评的形成（Routledge，1993 年）。

由该领域的领军人物撰写的有趣的知识分子自传论文集。

Greene, Gayle and Kahn, Coppelia, eds, Changing Subjects: The Making of Feminist Literary Criticism (Routledge, 1993).

An interesting collection of essays in intellectual autobiography by leading figures in the field.

雅各布斯，玛丽，编辑。女性写作和关于女性的写作（Croom Helm，1979 年）。关于维莱特、乔治·艾略特、伍尔夫、易卜生等

的章节。

Jacobus, Mary, ed. Women Writing and Writing about Women (Croom Helm, 1979).

Chapters on Villette, George Eliot, Woolf, Ibsen, etc.

Jacobus, Mary, Reading Woman: Essays in Feminist Criticism (Methuen, 1986)。

关于维莱特的章节、牙线磨坊、弗洛伊德的案例研究（参见“朵拉和怀孕的麦当娜”等）。

Jacobus, Mary, Reading Woman: Essays in Feminist Criticism (Methuen, 1986).

Chapters on Villette, The Mill on the Floss, Freud’s case studies (see ‘Dora and the Pregnant Madonna’, etc.).

Mills, Sara等人，女权主义读物：女权主义文学导论（Prentice Hall，1996 年）。

讨论女权主义的主要品种及其在一系列经典文学文本中的应用。可读性、实用性和信息性。

Mills, Sara, et al., Feminist Readings: An Introduction to Feminist Literature (Prentice Hall, 1996).

Discussions of major varieties of feminism and their application to a range of canonical literary texts. Readable, practical, and informative.

米洛，莎莉，编辑。女权主义批评中的问题（Routledge，1993）。一本有趣的书，涉及一些引起真正困难的话题。

Minogue, Sally, ed. Problems Within Feminist Criticism (Routledge, 1993). An interesting book which deals with some topics which have caused real difficulty.

Moi, Toril，性/文本政治（Methuen，1985 年）。

一本非常有影响力的书，尽管它对女权主义理论和批评的主要种类的看法受到了挑战。

Moi, Toril, Sexual/Textual Politics (Methuen, 1985).

A very influential book, though its view of the main kinds of feminist theory and criticism has been challenged.

Moi，Toril，什么是女人？（牛津大学出版社，2001 年）。

对女权主义许多方面的一个非常有趣的基本反思。
