“她是一位极其美丽的少女，除了充满欢乐之外，一点也不可爱。邪恶是她看到画家、爱上画家并嫁给画家的时刻。他，热情，好学，朴素，并且已经在他的艺术中找到了新娘；她是一位极其美丽的少女，除了充满欢乐之外，一点也不可爱：充满阳光和微笑，像小鹿一样嬉戏：热爱和珍惜所有事物：只讨厌她的竞争对手艺术：只害怕托盘和刷子和其他不幸的工具剥夺了她爱人的容颜。因此，这位女士听到画家说他甚至想描绘他年轻的新娘，真是一件可怕的事情。但她谦虚而听话，在黑暗的高塔楼室里温顺地坐了几个星期，那里的光线只从头顶上滴落在苍白的帆布上。但他，画家，以他的工作为荣，他的工作时时刻刻、日复一日地进行着。他是一个热情、狂野、喜怒无常的人，他在幻想中迷失了方向；这样他将没有看到那孤零零的塔楼里如此阴森森的光线使他新娘的健康和精神枯萎了，除了他之外，她对所有人都很渴望。然而她一直微笑着，没有抱怨，因为她看到这位画家（享有很高的声誉）从他的工作中获得了狂热而炽热的乐趣，日以继夜地描绘她，她如此爱他，但她却成长了每天都更加沮丧和虚弱。一些看到这幅画像的人很快就低声说起它的相似之处，就像一个巨大的奇迹，这不仅证明了画家的力量，也证明了他对她的深爱，因为他把她描绘得如此出色。但是最后，当工作接近尾声时，没有人被允许进入炮塔；因为画家对他的工作充满热情，他的眼睛很少从画布上移开，甚至看不起他妻子的面容。和他不会看到他在画布上涂抹的色彩是从坐在他旁边的她的脸颊上画出来的。几个星期过去了，除了在嘴上刷一把刷子和在眼睛上涂上一层色彩，几乎没有什么可做的了，这位女士的精神再次像灯座里的火焰一样闪烁起来。然后给刷子，然后上色；有一瞬间，画家站在他的作品前出神了。但是接下来，当他还在凝视的时候，他变得颤抖起来，脸色变得非常苍白，惊呆了，大声喊道：“这真是生命本身！” 突然转身看着他心爱的人：——她死了！'

‘She was a maiden of rarest beauty, and not more lovely than full of glee. And evil was the hour when she saw, and loved, and wedded the painter. He, passionate, studious, austere, and having already a bride in his Art; she a maiden of rarest beauty, and not more lovely than full of glee: all light and smiles, and frolicksome as the young fawn: loving and cherishing all things: hating only the Art which was her rival: dreading only the pallet and brushes and other untoward instruments which deprived her of the countenance of her lover. It was thus a terrible thing for this lady to hear the painter speak of his desire to portray even his young bride. But she was humble and obedient, and sat meekly for many weeks in the dark high turret-chamber where the light dripped upon the pale canvas only from overhead. But he, the painter, took glory in his work, which went on from hour to hour and from day to day. And he was a passionate, and wild and moody man, who became lost in reveries; so that he would not see that the light which fell so ghastily in that lone turret withered the health and the spirits of his bride, who pined visibly to all but him. Yet she smiled on and still on, uncomplainingly, because she saw that the painter, (who had high renown,) took a fervid and burning pleasure in his task, and wrought day and night to depict her who so loved him, yet who grew daily more dispirited and weak. And in sooth some who beheld the portrait spoke of its resemblance in low words, as of a mighty marvel, and a proof not less of the power of the painter than of his deep love for her whom he depicted so surpassingly well. But at length, as the labor drew nearer to its conclusion, there were admitted none into the turret; for the painter had grown wild with the ardor of his work, and turned his eyes from the canvas rarely, even to regard the countenance of his wife. And he would not see that the tints which he spread upon the canvas were drawn from the cheeks of her who sat beside him. And when many weeks had passed, and but little remained to do, save one brush upon the mouth and one tint upon the eye, the spirit of the lady again flickered up as the flame within the socket of the lamp. And then the brush was given, and then the tint was placed; and, for one moment, the painter stood entranced before the work which he had wrought; but in the next, while he yet gazed, he grew tremulous and very pallid, and aghast, and crying with a loud voice, “This is indeed Life itself!” turned suddenly to regard his beloved: – She was dead!’

（来源：Edgar Allan Poe: Selected Writings, Penguin）

(Source: Edgar Allan Poe: Selected Writings, Penguin)

附录 2 迪伦·托马斯 (Dylan Thomas)，“拒绝哀悼

伦敦一名儿童被火烧死”

Appendix 2 Dylan Thomas, ‘A Refusal to Mourn

the Death, by Fire, of a Child in London’

直到人类创造出

鸟兽和花朵

父亲和所有卑微的黑暗

静静地诉说着最后的曙光 寂静的

时刻

到来了 大海翻腾着挽具

Never until the mankind making

Bird beast and flower

Fathering and all humbling darkness

Tells with silence the last light breaking

And the still hour

Is come of the sea tumbling in harness

我必须再次进入

水珠环绕的锡安和麦穗

的犹太教堂

我是否可以让声音的影子祈祷

或将我的盐种撒

在最小的麻布山谷中以哀悼

And I must enter again the round

Zion of the water bead

And the synagogue of the ear of corn

Shall I let pray the shadow of a sound

Or sow my salt seed

In the least valley of sackcloth to mourn

孩子之死的威严和燃烧。

我不会谋杀

她带着严肃的真理而去的人类，也不会用任何进一步的天真和青春的挽歌

亵渎呼吸的站台。



The majesty and burning of the child’s death.

I shall not murder

The mankind of her going with a grave truth

Nor blaspheme down the stations of the breath

With any further

Elegy of innocence and youth.

在第一个死者的深处，躺着伦敦的女儿，长袍裹着

多年的朋友，

超越年龄的谷物，她母亲的黑脉，隐藏在泰晤士河

奔腾的平静河水旁。第一个死后，再无其他。



Deep with the first dead lies London’s daughter,

Robed in the long friends,

The grains beyond age, the dark veins of her mother,

Secret by the unmourning water

Of the riding Thames.

After the first death, there is no other.

（来源：诗集 1934–52，登特）

(Source: Collected Poems 1934–52, Dent)

附录 3 William Cowper，“漂流者”

Appendix 3 William Cowper, ‘The Castaway’

最阴暗的夜晚笼罩着天空，

大西洋的巨浪咆哮着，

Obscurest night involv’d the sky,

Th’ Atlantic billows roar’d,

当像我这样一个

注定要倒霉的人，从船上被冲走时，

When such a destin’d wretch as I,

Wash’d headlong from on board,

朋友，希望，所有失去的人，

他漂浮的家永远离开了。

Of friends, of hope, of all bereft,

His floating home for ever left.

没有比阿尔比恩更勇敢的酋长能比得上

和他一起去的那个人了，

No braver chief could Albion boast

Than he with whom he went,

没有一艘船离开阿尔比恩的海岸，

送来更温暖的祝福。

Nor ever ship left Albion’s coast,

With warmer wishes sent.

他爱他们两个，但都是徒劳的，

他没有看到，也没有再看到她。

He lov’d them both, but both in vain,

Nor him beheld, nor her again.

在汹涌的盐水下不久，

游泳专家，他躺下了；

Not long beneath the whelming brine,

Expert to swim, he lay;

很快他就感到自己的力量衰退，

或者勇气消失；

Nor soon he felt his strength decline,

Or courage die away;

而是与死亡一起摇摆不定，

被对生命的绝望所支撑。

But wag’d with death a lasting strife,

Supported by despair of life.

他喊道：他的朋友们也没有失败

检查船只的航向，

He shouted: nor his friends had fail’d

To check the vessel’s course,

但如此狂暴的爆炸占了上风，

那，无情的强制，

But so the furious blast prevail’d,

That, pitiless perforce,

他们把被抛弃的伙伴抛在身后，

在风中继续疾驰。

They left their outcast mate behind,

And scudded still before the wind.

一些帮助他们负担得起；

而且，如暴风雨允许，

Some succour yet they could afford;

And, such as storms allow,

木桶，笼子，漂浮的绳索，

Delay'd not give.

The cask, the coop, the floated cord,

Delay’d not to bestow.

但他（他们知道）既不是船，也不是岸，

无论他们给什么，都应该访问更多。

But he (they knew) nor ship, nor shore,

Whate’er they gave should visit more.

也不，尽管看起来很残酷，他也不能

谴责他们的匆忙，

Nor, cruel as it seem’d, could he

Their haste himself condemn,

意识到在这样的大海中飞行，

独自一人可以拯救他们；

Aware that flight, in such a sea,

Alone could rescue them;

然而苦涩的感觉仍然是被

遗弃，他的朋友们离他如此之近。

Yet bitter felt it still to die

Deserted, and his friends so nigh.

他活了很久，

在海洋中生活了一个小时，自立；

He long survives, who lives an hour

In ocean, self-upheld;

这么久以来，他一直没有用完，

他的命运被击退了；

And so long he, with unspent pow’r,

His destiny repell’d;

永远，随着时间的流逝，

恳求帮助，或哭泣——再见！

And ever, as the minutes flew,

Entreated help, or cried – Adieu!

最后，他短暂的喘息过去，

他的同志们，谁以前

At length, his transient respite past,

His comrades, who before

在每一次爆炸中都听到了他

的声音，再也听不到声音了。

Had heard his voice in ev’ry blast,

Could catch the sound no more.

因为那时，他被制服了，喝下了

令人窒息的浪潮，然后沉没了。

For then, by toil subdued, he drank

The stifling wave, and then he sank.

没有诗人为他哭泣：但

叙事的页面真诚，

No poet wept him: but the page

Of narrative sincere,

这说明了他的名字，他的价值，他的年龄

被安森的泪水浸湿。

That tells his name, his worth, his age

Is wet with Anson’s tear.

吟游诗人或英雄流下的眼泪

同样使死者永垂不朽。

And tears by bards or heroes shed

Alike immortalize the dead.

因此，我不打算，或梦想，

Descanting 对他的命运，

I therefore purpose not, or dream,

Descanting on his fate,

给忧郁的主题

一个更经久不衰的约会：

To give the melancholy theme

A more enduring date:

但苦难仍然乐于

在他人的案例中寻找它的“表象”。

But misery still delights to trace

Its ‘semblance in another’s case.

没有声音预言暴风雨已经平息，

没有吉祥的光亮；

No voice divine the storm allay’d,

No light propitious shone;

当，从所有有效的援助中被夺走，

我们死去，每个人：

When, snatch’d from all effectual aid,

We perish’d, each alone:

但我在波涛汹涌的大海之下，

淹没在比他更深的深渊中。

But I beneath a rougher sea,

And whelm’d in deeper gulphs than he.

（来源：The Penguin Book of English Romantic Verse， ed. David Wright，Penguin）

(Source: The Penguin Book of English Romantic Verse, ed. David Wright, Penguin)

我们从这里去哪里？

延伸阅读

Where do we go from here?

Further reading

一般指南

General guides

Bennett, Andrew 和 Royle, Nicholas，文学、批评和理论导论（Prentice Hall，第 2 版，1999 年）。生动有趣。

Bennett, Andrew and Royle, Nicholas, An Introduction to Literature, Criticism and Theory (Prentice Hall, 2nd edn, 1999). Lively and interesting.

Bertens, Hans，文学理论：基础（Routledge，2001）。

一个有趣的系列的新成员。

Bertens, Hans, Literary Theory: The Basics (Routledge, 2001).

New addition to an interesting series.

Castle, Gregory，布莱克威尔文学理论指南（布莱克威尔，2007 年）。

有条不紊，范围广泛，但与其说是一本通读书，不如说是一本参考书。

Castle, Gregory, The Blackwell Guide to Literary Theory (Blackwell, 2007).

Methodical and broad in scope, but more a reference work than a read-through book.

Culler, Jonathan，文学理论：一个非常简短的介绍（牛津大学出版社，新版，2000 年）。

实用又活泼。

Culler, Jonathan, Literary Theory: A Very Short Introduction (Oxford University Press, new edn, 2000).

Useful and lively.

Culler, Jonathan，理论中的文学（斯坦福大学出版社，2006 年）。

讨论文学理论对文学的忽视——一本来自理论先驱之一的受欢迎的书。

Culler, Jonathan, The Literary in Theory (Stanford University Press, 2006).

Discusses the neglect of literature by literary theory – a welcome book from one of the pioneer presenters of theory.

Durant, Alan 和 Fabb, Nigel，《行动中的文学研究》（Routledge，1990 年）。

雄心勃勃和创新，但并不总是成功。

Durant, Alan and Fabb, Nigel, Literary Studies in Action (Routledge, 1990).

Ambitious and innovative, but not always successful.

Eagleton, Terry，文学理论：介绍（Blackwell，第 2 版，1996 年）。

Eagleton, Terry, Literary Theory: An Introduction (Blackwell, 2nd edn, 1996).

Eagleton, Terry，文学理论：简介（Blackwell，周年纪念版，2008 年）。

这本开创性的书再版。

第一份综合指南即将出版。有时很有趣，有时很困难，现在需要更新。

Eagleton, Terry, Literary Theory: An Introduction (Blackwell, Anniversary Edition, 2008).

A re-issue of this pioneering book.

The first comprehensive guide to be published. Sometimes entertaining, sometimes difficult, and now in need of updating.

Lynn, Steven, Texts and Contexts: Writing about Literature with Critical Theory（朗文出版社，第 3 版，2000 年）。

非常人性化，并且非常强调理论作为批判性实践，但是对我来说，对写作的逐步帮助的强调似乎过分了，因为举例说明的写作任务非常具体。

Lynn, Steven, Texts and Contexts: Writing about Literature with Critical Theory (Longman, 3rd edn, 2000).

Very user-friendly and with a strong emphasis on theory as critical practice, but the emphasis on step by step help with writing seems excessive to me, since the writing tasks exemplified are so very specific.

Selden、Raman、Widdowson、Peter 和 Brooker，Peter，当代文学理论读者指南（Harvester，第 4 版，1996 年）。

公平、详细的报道：最初是在伊格尔顿之后不久出版的，虽然缺乏他的智慧，但它具有最近更新的优势。

Selden, Raman, Widdowson, Peter, and Brooker, Peter, A Reader’s Guide to Contemporary Literary Theory (Harvester, 4th edn, 1996).

Even-handed, detailed coverage: originally published soon after Eagleton’s, and though it lacks his wit, it has the advantage of recent updating.

Tyson, Lois, Critical Theory Today: A User-Friendly Guide (Garland, 1999)。

一本好书，尽管将所有理论应用于单一文本

（了不起的盖茨比）的策略并不总是成功。

Tyson, Lois, Critical Theory Today: A User-Friendly Guide (Garland, 1999).

A good book, though the ploy of applying all the theories to a single text

(The Great Gatsby) doesn’t always succeed.

罗杰·韦伯斯特，研究文学理论：简介（阿诺德，第 2 版，1995 年）。

非常简短，但通常很清楚其他人没有的地方。

Webster, Roger, Studying Literary Theory: An Introduction (Arnold, 2nd edn, 1995).

Very brief, but quite often clear where others are not.

Wolfreys，朱利安，编辑。文学理论介绍：指南和词汇表

（爱丁堡大学出版社，2001 年）。

一种新颖独特的格式：不同的贡献者使用一个小的文学文本“库”来进行他们的文学应用——比只使用一个文本更好的主意。

Wolfreys, Julian, ed. Introducing Literary Theories: A Guide and Glossary

(Edinburgh University Press, 2001).

A new and distinctive format: the various contributors use a small ‘reservoir’ of literary texts for their literary applications – a better idea than using just one text.

相关书籍

Reference books

Coyle, Martin, et al., eds, Encyclopedia of Literature and Criticism (Routledge, 1990).

丰富的有用材料。

Coyle, Martin, et al., eds, Encyclopedia of Literature and Criticism (Routledge, 1990).

A wealth of helpful material.

Cuddon, JA 和 Preston, CE，企鹅文学术语和文学理论词典（企鹅出版社，第 4 版，2000 年）。

有了很大改进，并且对主要关键方法的长条目进行了深入研究。

Cuddon, J. A. and Preston, C. E., The Penguin Dictionary of Literary Terms and Literary Theory (Penguin, 4th edn, 2000).

Much improved, and the long entries on major critical approaches are well-researched.

霍索恩，杰里米，当代文学理论词汇表（爱德华阿诺德，第 4 版，2000 年）。我发现这些条目中的大部分都非常有帮助。

Hawthorn, Jeremy, A Glossary of Contemporary Literary Theory (Edward Arnold, 4th edn, 2000). I have found most of these entries very helpful.

Sim、Stuart 和 Parker, Noel，现代文学和文化理论家的 A 到 Z 指南（Prentice Hall，1997 年）。

所有主要理论家的字母顺序列表，每个都有一篇简短的文章和参考书目。一贯有用。

Sim, Stuart and Parker, Noel, The A to Z Guide to Modern Literary and Cultural Theorists (Prentice Hall, 1997).

An alphabetical listing of all the major theorists, with a brief essay and a bibliography on each. Consistently useful.

威尔士，凯蒂，文体学词典（朗文，第 2 版，2001 年）。在各个方面都令人印象深刻，并且总是很有启发性。

Wales, Katie, A Dictionary of Stylistics (Longman, 2nd edn, 2001). Impressive in every way and always enlightening.

Wolfreys，朱利安，编辑。爱丁堡现代批评与理论百科全书（爱丁堡大学出版社，2002 年）。

组织良好的大量论文资源，可在您的图书馆中查阅。

Wolfreys, Julian, ed. The Edinburgh Encyclopedia of Modern Criticism and Theory (Edinburgh University Press, 2002).

A well organised resource of substantial essays to consult in your library.

一般读者

General readers

巴里，彼得，编辑。当代批判理论中的问题（Macmillan Casebook，1987）。

一些困难的材料，但强烈推荐。

Barry, Peter, ed. Issues in Contemporary Critical Theory (Macmillan Casebook, 1987).

Some difficult material, but highly recommended.

Leitch, Vincent, B. ed., The Norton Anthology of Theory and Criticism（诺顿，2001 年）。

涵盖范围从最早到现在，但这一卷的长度是 1980 年代先驱理论读者的八倍。

Leitch, Vincent, B. ed., The Norton Anthology of Theory and Criticism (Norton, 2001).

Coverage is from earliest times to the present, but this volume is eight times the length of the pioneer theory readers of the 1980s.

Lodge、David 和 Wood Nigel 合着，《现代批评与理论：读本》（朗文出版社，第 2 版，1999 年）。

极好的材料来源。将提供许多主要人物著作的初步“实践”经验。合理的长度。

Lodge, David and Wood Nigel, eds, Modern Criticism and Theory: A Reader (Longman, 2nd edn, 1999).

An excellent source of material. Will give initial ‘hands-on’ experience of the writings of many of the major figures. Sensible length.

牛顿，KM，编辑。理论付诸实践（Macmillan，1992 年）。

大量关于应用理论的文章。

Newton, K. M., ed. Theory into Practice (Macmillan, 1992).

A strong collection of pieces on applied theory.

牛顿，KM，编辑。二十世纪文学理论：读者（Palgrave，第 2 版，1997）。

有用且范围广泛。一个有价值的非大象读者。

Newton, K. M., ed. Twentieth Century Literary Theory: A Reader (Palgrave, 2nd edn, 1997).

Useful and wide-ranging. A valuable non-elephantine reader.

Rice、Philip 和 Waugh、Patricia 编着的《现代文学理论：读者》（Arnold，第 4 版，2001 年）。

另一个极好的来源。仍然是一个合理的长度。

Rice, Philip and Waugh, Patricia, eds, Modern Literary Theory: A Reader (Arnold, 4th edn, 2001).

Another excellent source. Still a sensible length.

Rivkin, Julie 和 Ryan, Michael, eds,文学理论：选集（Blackwell，第 2 版，2004 年）。

流行，但对于它的目的来说太大了，而且它所包含的理论还不够文学。

Rivkin, Julie and Ryan, Michael, eds, Literary Theory: An Anthology (Blackwell, 2nd edn, 2004).

Popular, but too big for its purpose, and not enough of the theory it contains is literary.

Selden, Raman，《从柏拉图到现在的批评理论：读者》（朗文出版社，1988 年）。

综合时间跨度，但一些摘录的简洁令人恼火，而且分组有时也很古怪。

Selden, Raman, The Theory of Criticism from Plato to the Present: A Reader (Longman, 1988).

Comprehensive time-span, but the brevity of some of the extracts is irritating, and the groupings are sometimes eccentric.

Walder, Dennis，现代世界的文学：评论文章和文献（牛津大学出版社和开放大学，1990 年）。

非常有用的重要文件和声明的集合，具有出色的编辑链接。

Walder, Dennis, Literature in the Modern World: Critical Essays and Documents (Oxford University Press and Open University, 1990).

A very useful collection of important documents and statements, with excellent editorial linking.

Waugh, Patricia, ed., Literary Theory and Criticism: An Oxford Guide（牛津大学出版社，2006 年）。

专为学生读者编写的论文集，因此这是一本与众不同的读者。四个部分，其中最后一个“未来与回顾”特别有趣。

Waugh, Patricia, ed., Literary Theory and Criticism: An Oxford Guide (Oxford University Press, 2006).

A collection of essays written especially for a student readership, so this is a reader with a difference. Four sections, of which the last, ‘Futures and retrospects’, is particularly interesting.

应用批判理论：十二个早期例子

Applying critical theory: twelve early examples

Dollimore, Jonathan 和 Sinfield, Alan, eds, Political Shakespeare: New Essays in Cultural Materialism（曼彻斯特大学出版社，1994 年第 2 版）。

很多有用的材料。例如，参见斯蒂芬·格林布拉特 (Stephen Greenblatt ) 的第二章“看不见的子弹：文艺复兴时期的权威及其颠覆，亨利四世和亨利五世”。这是经典的新历史主义文章，很多转载。还有第五章“重男轻女的吟游诗人：女权主义批评和莎士比亚：李尔王和衡量标准”。

Dollimore, Jonathan and Sinfield, Alan, eds, Political Shakespeare: New Essays in Cultural Materialism (Manchester University Press, 2nd edn 1994).

Much useful material. See, for example, chapter two ‘Invisible bullets: Renaissance authority and its subversion, Henry IV and Henry V’, Stephen Greenblatt. This is the classic new historicist essay, much reprinted. Also chapter five ‘The patriarchal bard: feminist criticism and Shakespeare: King Lear and Measure for Measure’.

Easthope，安东尼，编辑。当代诗歌遇见现代理论（Harvester，1991）。

第五章：Rick Rylance 的“Tony Harrison 的语言”。实践批评的“理论化”形式的另一个例子。粗略地说，这种方法是“文化主义的”——它使用相关文件、社会数据等将诗歌置于其当代背景中。（如果材料不是当代的，“文化主义”的解读将被称为“新历史主义”。）

Easthope, Antony, ed. Contemporary Poetry Meets Modern Theory (Harvester, 1991).

Chapter five: ‘Tony Harrison’s languages’ by Rick Rylance. Another example of a ‘theoreticised’ form of practical criticism. The approach is, roughly, ‘culturalist’ – it places the poetry within its contemporary setting using relevant documents, social data, etc. (‘Culturalist’ readings would be called ‘new historicist’ if the material were not contemporary.)

Gilbert, Sandra 和 Gubar, Susan, The Madwoman in the Attic: The Women Writer and the Nineteenth Century Literary Imagination（耶鲁大学出版社，1979）。

关于奥斯丁、勃朗特丝、乔治·艾略特等的章节。

Gilbert, Sandra and Gubar, Susan, The Madwoman in the Attic: The Woman Writer and the Nineteenth Century Literary Imagination (Yale University Press, 1979).

Chapters on Austen, Brontës, George Eliot, etc.

Jacobus, Mary, Reading Woman: Essays in Feminist Criticism (Methuen, 1986)。

关于 Villette 的章节、关于牙线的 Mill和弗洛伊德的案例研究（参见“朵拉和怀孕的麦当娜”）。

Jacobus, Mary, Reading Woman: Essays in Feminist Criticism (Methuen, 1986).

Chapters on Villette, Mill on the Floss and Freud’s case studies (see ‘Dora and the Pregnant Madonna’).

Kurzweil, Edith, Literature and Psychoanalysis（哥伦比亚大学出版社，1983 年）。

第十五章是对亨利詹姆斯的非凡故事“欢乐角”的精神分析解读。威廉·恩普森 (William Empson) 的《爱丽丝梦游仙境》的第 20 章，摘自他的《一些版本的田园》一书。

Kurzweil, Edith, Literature and Psychoanalysis (Columbia University Press, 1983).

Chapter fifteen is a psychoanalytic reading of Henry James’s extraordinary tale ‘The Jolly Corner’. Chapter twenty by William Empson ‘Alice in Wonderland – The Child as Swain’, from his book Some Versions of Pastoral.

Lodge, David，巴赫金之后：关于小说和批评的论文（Routledge，1990）。

第二章：“现代小说中的模仿和叙事”以费·韦尔登、乔治·艾略特、詹姆斯·乔伊斯等人为例（结构主义），考察了小说中呈现材料的不同方式。第五章：“现代小说中的对话”以伊夫林沃为主要例子（语言学）考察了呈现对话的不同方式。

Lodge, David, After Bakhtin: Essays on Fiction and Criticism (Routledge, 1990).

Chapter two: ‘Mimesis and diegesis in modern fiction’ examines different ways of presenting material in a novel, using Fay Weldon, George Eliot, James Joyce, etc., as examples (structuralism). Chapter five: ‘Dialogue in the modern novel’ examines different ways of presenting dialogue, using Evelyn Waugh as main example (linguistics).

Machin, Richard 和 Norris, Christopher, eds, Post-structuralist Readings of English Poetry（剑桥大学出版社，1987 年）。

关于多恩的章节、弥尔顿的“失明”十四行诗、格雷的“挽歌”、柯勒律治的“古水手”等等。并不总是容易阅读，但这里有一些好东西。凯瑟琳·贝尔西 (Catherine Belsey) 关于马维尔 (Marvell) 的《致他腼腆的情妇》(To his Coy Mistress) 的文章实际上是新历史主义文学研究方法的一个很好的例子。

Machin, Richard and Norris, Christopher, eds, Post-structuralist Readings of English Poetry (Cambridge University Press, 1987).

Chapters on Donne, Milton’s ‘Blindness’ sonnet, Gray’s ‘Elegy’, Coleridge’s ‘Ancient Mariner’, and so on. Not always easy reading, but some good things here. Catherine Belsey’s essay on Marvell’s ‘To his Coy Mistress’ is actually a good example of the new historicist approach to literature.

Muller, John P. 和 Richardson, William J., eds, The Purloined Poe: Lacan, Derrida, and Psychoanalytic Reading（约翰霍普金斯大学出版社，1988）。

这本散文集是关于爱伦·坡的故事《失窃的信》，该故事在 80 年代后期引起了批判理论家的极大关注。但是看还有第六章（第 101-32 页）摘自玛丽·波拿巴 1930 年代关于爱伦·坡的书，该书使他接受了“直接”的精神分析方法。

Muller, John P. and Richardson, William J., eds, The Purloined Poe: Lacan, Derrida, and Psychoanalytic Reading (Johns Hopkins University Press, 1988).

This collection of essays is about Poe’s tale ‘The Purloined Letter’, which excited much attention in the late 1980s from critical theorists. But see also chapter six (pp. 101–32) extracted from Marie Bonaparte’s 1930s book on Poe, which subjects him to a ‘straight’ psychoanalytic approach.

默里，大卫，编辑。文学理论与诗歌：扩展经典（Batsford，1989）。

第三章“不完美的图书管理员：荒原和四个四重奏中的文本与话语”。第四章“参照系：对三位女诗人的接受和回应”（狄金森、普拉斯、摩尔）。这两章是“理论化”实践批评的好例子。他们利用源自女权主义、解构主义和（在后一种情况下）精神分析的技术。

Murray, David, ed. Literary Theory and Poetry: Extending the Canon (Batsford, 1989).

Chapter three ‘The imperfect librarian: text and discourse in The Waste Land and Four Quartets’. Chapter four ‘Frames of reference: the reception of, and response to, three women poets’ (Dickinson, Plath, Moore). These two chapters are good examples of ‘theoreticised’ practical criticism. They make use of techniques derived from feminism, deconstruction, and (in the latter case) psychoanalysis.

Selden, Raman，实践理论和阅读文献：简介（Harvester，1989 年）。

二十四个简短的章节举例说明了所有主要理论在实践中的应用——结构主义、后结构主义、马克思主义、女权主义等等。有用的项目，但通常过于简短。

Selden, Raman, Practising Theory and Reading Literature: An Introduction (Harvester, 1989).

Twenty-four short chapters give examples of all the main theories in practice – structuralism, post-structuralism, Marxism, feminism, and so on. Useful items but often excessively brief.

Stubbs, Patricia, Women and Fiction: Feminism and the Novel, 1880–1920 (Harvester, 1979).

关于哈代、福斯特、劳伦斯、伍尔夫等的随笔。

Stubbs, Patricia, Women and Fiction: Feminism and the Novel, 1880–1920 (Harvester, 1979).

Essays on Hardy, Forster, Lawrence, Woolf, etc.

塔拉克，道格拉斯，编辑。工作中的文学理论：三篇文章（Batsford，1987）。

结构主义、马克思主义、女权主义、精神分析和解构主义应用于三个故事：康拉德的黑暗之心、亨利·詹姆斯的“笼中”和 DH 劳伦斯的“圣莫尔”。

Tallack, Douglas, ed. Literary Theory at Work: Three Texts (Batsford, 1987).

Structuralism, Marxism, feminism, psychoanalysis, and deconstruction applied to three stories: Conrad’s Heart of Darkness, Henry James’s ‘In the Cage’, and D. H. Lawrence’s ‘St Mawr’.

反对理论

Against theory

Burgess, Catherine, Challenging Theory: Discipline after Deconstruction (Ashgate, 1999)

一本关于理论对人文教学的影响的深思熟虑的书。

Burgess, Catherine, Challenging Theory: Discipline after Deconstruction (Ashgate, 1999)

A thoughtful book about the effects of theory on the teaching of the Humanities.

Ellis, John M.，反对解构主义（普林斯顿大学出版社，1989 年）。

一本争论不休的书，语气温和而不是好斗，始终坚定地关注文学理论对阅读文学实践的影响。

Ellis, John M., Against Deconstruction (Princeton University Press, 1989).

A well-argued book, temperate rather than belligerent in tone, and with a firm focus throughout on the effects of literary theory on the practice of reading literature.

Jackson, Leonard，结构主义的贫困：文学和结构主义理论（Longman，1991）。

主要是基础语言学和结构主义哲学的基础性错误；对结构主义理论对文学批评实践的影响的讨论要少得多。

Jackson, Leonard, The Poverty of Structuralism: Literature and Structuralist Theory (Longman, 1991).

Mainly on foundational errors in the underlying linguistics and philosophy of structuralism; has rather less on the consequences of structuralist theory for literary-critical practice.

勒纳，劳伦斯，编辑。重建文学（布莱克威尔，1983 年）。

参见 Cedric Watts 的第一章和第五章。对理论的粗暴攻击，但主要是关于其哲学缺陷。

Lerner, Laurence, ed. Reconstructing Literature (Blackwell, 1983).

See chapters one and five by Cedric Watts. A brusque attack on theory, but mainly about its philosophical shortcomings.

Patai、Daphne 和 Corral, Will H.，理论的帝国：异议选集（哥伦比亚大学出版社，2005 年）。

一本反理论读物，由大约 50 篇文章组成，主要来自 1980 年代和 90 年代：一些来自著名作家的生动而经典的作品，但与大多数读者一样，它的篇幅适得其反。

Patai, Daphne, and Corral, Will H., Theory’s Empire: An Anthology of Dissent (Columbia University Press, 2005).

An anti-theory reader consisting of around fifty essays, mainly from the 1980s and 1990s: some lively and classic pieces from eminent writers, but like most readers, it is counter-productively over-sized.

Paulin, Tom, Ireland and the English Crisis (Bloodaxe, 1984)。

参见第 148–54 页，“English Now”，最初是《伦敦重读英语书评》中的敌意评论，编辑。Peter Widdowson，一本有影响力的“理论”书。这篇文章在该杂志的“战争批评家”标题下激起了一年的愤怒通信。

Paulin, Tom, Ireland and the English Crisis (Bloodaxe, 1984).

See pp. 148–54, ‘English Now’, which was originally a hostile review in the London Review of Books of Re-Reading English, ed. Peter Widdowson, an influential ‘theory’ book. The piece provoked a year of angry correspondence in the journal under the heading ‘Critics at War’.

Tallis, Raymond, Not Saussure: A Critique of Post-Saussurean Literary Theory (Macmillan, 1988).

对结构主义者和后结构主义者对索绪尔思想的使用的有力批评。

Tallis, Raymond, Not Saussure: A Critique of Post-Saussurean Literary Theory (Macmillan, 1988).

A vigorous critique of the use of Saussure’s ideas by structuralists and post-structuralists.

Tallis, Raymond, Enemies of Hope (Palgrave, 1999)。

这位总是充满活力的作家对“文化批判”和“歇斯底里的人道主义”进行了全面的揭穿。

Tallis, Raymond, Enemies of Hope (Palgrave, 1999).

A general denbunking of ‘Kulturkritik’ and ‘hysterical humanism’ by this always lively writer.

Washington, Peter, Fraud: Literary Theory and the End of English (Fontana, 1989).

主要关注攻击激进批判理论与激进政治的联系。

Washington, Peter, Fraud: Literary Theory and the End of English (Fontana, 1989).

Mainly concerned with attacking the linking of radical critical theory and radical politics.

德里达、雅克、64 –9、82、267、277 –80、283 –5、287、301 _ _ _ _ _ _

Dickens, Charles, 18, 45, 226

故事情节, 27 , 223 –4

Docherty, Thomas, 1, 287

乔纳森·多利莫尔，176岁，178岁，274 岁

Dollimore, Jonathan, 176, 178, 274

约翰·多恩，38 –9

Donne, John, 38–9

多诺霍，丹尼斯，267

Donoghue, Denis, 267

双端框架叙述, 227 –8, 234

double-ended frame narratives, 227–8, 234

道格拉斯·基思，144 岁

Douglas, Keith, 144

*讲师是 Eric Mottram，他于 1995 年 1 月去世。
* The lecturer was Eric Mottram, who died in January 1995.
1一些主要的结构主义者指出了其中的一些局限性并提出了改进建议：参见 Claude Lévi-Strauss, Structural Anthropology, vol. 2, (Allen Lane, 1977)，第八章，“结构和形式：对弗拉基米尔·普罗普 (Vladimir Propp) 作品的反思”：和 Tzvetan Todorov，散文诗学(Basil Blackwell, 1977)，第十四章，“叙事转换”。
1 A number of the major structuralists pointed out some of these limitations and suggested refinements: see Claude Lévi-Strauss, Structural Anthropology, vol. 2, (Allen Lane, 1977), chapter eight, ‘Structure and form: reflections on a work by Vladimir Propp’: and Tzvetan Todorov, The Poetics of Prose (Basil Blackwell, 1977), chapter fourteen, ‘Narrative transformations’.
2我在Orbis Litterarum, 46/1, spring 1991, pp. 87–104, 'Embarrassments and predicaments: patterns of interaction in James's writer tales'中使用改编的 Proppian 方法检查了詹姆斯的一组故事。
2 I examine a group of James’s tales using an adapted Proppian method in Orbis Litterarum, 46/1, spring 1991, pp. 87–104, ‘Embarrassments and predicaments: patterns of interaction in James’s writer tales’.
3正如 Genette 指出的（第 162 页），模仿和叙事之间的区别最初是由柏拉图在《理想国》第三卷中做出的。因此，与亚里士多德一样，当代叙事学植根于古典希腊哲学。
3 As Genette points out (p. 162), the distinction between mimesis and diegesis was originally made by Plato in Book III of The Republic. So, as with Aristotle, contemporary narratology has roots in classical Greek philosophy.
4欧内斯特·海明威的《前四十九个故事》（Arrow Books，1993 年）。
4 In Ernest Hemingway, The First Forty-Nine Stories (Arrow Books, 1993).
1 Branch 的介绍，以及在 1994 年的一次座谈会上发表的十二篇短文 one criticism，都可以在 ASLE 网站上找到：www.asle.org/site/resources/ecocritical-library/intro/defining
1 Branch’s introduction, and the twelve short pieces presented at a 1994 symposium one cocriticism, can all be accessed in the ASLE website at: www.asle.org/site/resources/ecocritical-library/intro/defining
2他写道：“正如罗伯特·波格·哈里森 (Robert Pogue Harrison) 在其非凡著作《

森林：文明的影子》中所展示的那样，帝国主义总是带来森林砍伐和自然资源的消耗”（第 87 页）。
2 He writes: ‘As Robert Pogue Harrison has demonstrated in his remarkable book

Forests: The Shadow of Civilization, imperialism has always brought with it deforestation and the consuming of natural resources’ (p. 87).
3我记得威廉姆斯在 1980 年代的一次文学理论会议上，对演讲者在不得不使用“自然”这个词时紧张的道歉感到越来越恼火——即使是像“问题的本质”这样看似无辜的短语也成了禁忌，或者被认为在公开使用之前需要精心熏蒸。
3 I recall Williams at a conference on literary theory in the 1980s becoming increasingly irritated at the nervous apologies offered by speakers whenever they had to use the word ‘nature’ – even apparently innocent phrases like ‘the nature of the problem’ had become taboo, or were felt to require elaborate fumigation before being used in public.
4例如，参见梭罗的文章“行走”（摘自 Coupe，第 23-5 页），其中讨论了这些问题：他写道“我不知道有任何诗歌可以引用来充分表达对野性的这种渴望”。
4 See, for instance, Thoreau’s essay ‘Walking’ (extracted in Coupe, pp. 23–5), which discusses these matters: he writes ‘I do not know of any poetry to quote which adequately expresses this yearning for the Wild’.
5贝特区分“浅绿色”和“深绿色”（地球之歌， 第 37 页）：前者是重视自然的“环保主义者”，因为它“包围”人类并为我们的福祉做出贡献；他们相信我们可以通过更负责任的消费和生产形式来“拯救”地球：“深绿色”或“深层生态学家”采取更激进的立场——技术是问题所在，因此不能成为解决方案，所以我们有（以某种方式）“回归自然”：他们不喜欢以人类为中心的术语“环境”，更喜欢“自然”，被视为是为了自然而存在，而不是为了我们。
5 Bate distinguishes ‘light Greens’ and ‘dark Greens’ (The Song of the Earth, p. 37): the former are ‘environmentalists’ who value nature because it ‘environs’ humanity and contributes to our well-being; they believe we can ‘save’ the planet by more responsible forms of consumption and production: ‘dark Greens’, or ‘deep ecologists’ take a more radical stance – technology is the problem and therefore can’t be the solution, so we have (in some way) to ‘get back to nature’: they dislike the anthropocentric term ‘environment’, preferring ‘nature’, viewed as being there for its own sake, not ours.
6这是脚注 1 中提到的专题讨论会的项目之一。
6 This is one of the items from the symposium mentioned in footnote 1.
7如果手头没有，可以从网站下载完整文本，例如：www.kingkong.demon.co.uk/gsr/usher.htm。
7 If you do not have it to hand you can download the complete text from a website, such as: www.kingkong.demon.co.uk/gsr/usher.htm.
8 在 Memoriam 中， 123：“群山是影子，它们流动/从一个形式到另一个形式，没有什么是站立的；/它们像薄雾一样融化，坚实的土地，/像云彩一样，它们塑造自己然后离开'。
8 In Memoriam, 123: ‘The hills are shadows, and they flow / From form to form, and nothing stands; / They melt like mist, the solid lands, / Like clouds they shape themselves and go’.
*举个老生常谈的例子，下面两个句子的“表层”句法相同，“深层”句法不同，这才是它们的真正含义所在：“The chicken was ready to eat”。“主席准备吃饭了”。
* To give a clichéd example, the following two sentences have the same ‘surface’ syntax but different ‘deep’ syntax, and that is where their true meaning lies: ‘The chicken was ready to eat’. ‘The Chairman was ready to eat’.
*我在PN Review, 173 (vol. 33, no. 3), Jan.–Feb.的演讲和文章中大致提出了这个观点。2007 年，第 16-20 页（“欧洲英语研究学会”会议全体演讲文本，2006 年）。它提倡“完全文本性”的概念，在我的English in Practice， Arnold，2003 年的那个名字的章节中对此进行了解释。
* I put forward roughly this view in a lecture and article entitled ‘An academic discipline foresees its death’ in PN Review, 173 (vol. 33, no. 3), Jan.–Feb. 2007, pp. 16–20 (text of plenary lecture at the ‘European Society for the Study of English’ Conference, 2006). It advocates a notion of ‘total textuality’ which is explained in the chapter of that name in my English in Practice, Arnold, 2003.
